BioGTK  4.1.0
A .NET library & program for annotating, editing various microscopy imaging formats using Bioformats supported images. Including whole slide, pyramidal, and series.

37 public static BioImage GetImage(string ids)
38 {
39 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
40 {
41 if (images[i].ID == ids || images[i].file == ids)
42 return images[i];
43 }
44 return null;
45 }
49 public static void AddImage(BioImage im, bool newtab)
50 {
51 if (images.Contains(im)) return;
52 im.Filename = GetImageName(im.ID);
53 im.ID = im.Filename;
54 images.Add(im);
55
56 if (App.tabsView != null)
57 {
58 System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run(() =>
59 {
60 // update ui on main UI thread
61 Application.Invoke(delegate
62 {
63 App.nodeView.UpdateItems();
64 if (newtab)
65 App.tabsView.AddTab(im);
66 else
67 {
68 if(App.viewer!=null)
69 App.viewer.AddImage(im);
70 else
71 App.tabsView.AddTab(im);
72 }
73 Console.WriteLine("Added image " + im.Filename + " to Images Table.");
74 });
75 });
76 }
77 else
78 {
79 Console.WriteLine("App.tabsView is null.");

88 public static int GetImageCountByName(string s)
89 {
90 string name = Path.GetFileName(s);
91 string ext = Path.GetExtension(s);
92 if(name.Split('-').Length > 2)
93 name = name.Remove(name.LastIndexOf('-'),name.Length - name.LastIndexOf('-'));
94 int i = 0;
95 for (int im = 0; im < images.Count; im++)
96 {
97 if (images[im].ID.Contains(name) && images[im].ID.EndsWith(ext))
98 i++;
99 }
100 return i;
101 }
107 public static string GetImageName(string s)
108 {
109 //Here we create a unique ID for an image.
110 int i = Images.GetImageCountByName(s);
111 if (i == 0)
112 return Path.GetFileName(s);
113 string name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(s);
114 if (Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(name)!=name)
115 name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(name);
116 string ext = s.Substring(s.IndexOf('.'),s.Length-s.IndexOf('.'));
117 if(name.Split('-').Length > 2)
118 {
119 string sts = name.Remove(name.LastIndexOf('-'),name.Length-name.LastIndexOf('-'));
120 return sts + "-" + i + ext;
121 }
122 else
123 return name + "-" + i + ext;
124 }
128 public static void RemoveImage(BioImage im)
129 {
130 RemoveImage(im.ID);
131 }
137 public static void RemoveImage(string id)
138 {
139 BioImage im = GetImage(id);
140 if (im == null)
141 return;
142 images.Remove(im);
143 System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Run(() =>
144 {
145 // update ui on main UI thread
146 Application.Invoke(delegate
147 {
148 App.nodeView.UpdateItems();
149 App.tabsView.RemoveTab(im.Filename);
150 });
151 });
152 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.Images.RemoveImage(" + '"' + id + '"' + ");");
153 }
159 public static void UpdateImage(BioImage im)
160 {
161 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
162 {
163 if (images[i].ID == im.ID)
164 {
165 images[i] = im;
166 return;
167 }
168 }

171 /* A struct that is used to store the resolution of an image. */
172 /* A struct that is used to store the resolution of an image. */
173 public struct Resolution
174 {
175 int x;
176 int y;
177 PixelFormat format;
178 double px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz;
179 public int SizeX
180 {
181 get { return x; }
182 set { x = value; }
183 }
184 public int SizeY
185 {
186 get { return y; }
187 set { y = value; }
188 }
189 public double PhysicalSizeX
190 {
191 get { return px; }
192 set { px = value; }
193 }
194 public double PhysicalSizeY
195 {
196 get { return py; }
197 set { py = value; }
198 }
199 public double PhysicalSizeZ
200 {
201 get { return pz; }
202 set { pz = value; }
203 }
204 public double StageSizeX
205 {
206 get { return sx; }
207 set { sx = value; }
208 }
209 public double StageSizeY
210 {
211 get { return sy; }
212 set { sy = value; }
213 }
214 public double StageSizeZ
215 {
216 get { return sz; }
217 set { sz = value; }
218 }
219 public double VolumeWidth
220 {
221 get
222 {
223 return PhysicalSizeX * SizeX;
224 }
225 }
226 public double VolumeHeight
227 {
228 get
229 {
230 return PhysicalSizeY * SizeY;
231 }
232 }
233 public PixelFormat PixelFormat
234 {
235 get { return format; }
236 set { format = value; }
237 }
238 public int RGBChannelsCount
239 {
240 get
241 {
242 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
243 return 1;
244 else if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
245 return 3;
246 else
247 return 4;
248 }
249 }
250 public long SizeInBytes
251 {
252 get
253 {
254 if (format == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
255 return (long)y * (long)x;
256 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
257 return (long)y * (long)x * 2;
258 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
259 return (long)y * (long)x * 3;
260 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
261 return (long)y * (long)x * 4;
262 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
263 return (long)y * (long)x * 6;
264 throw new NotSupportedException(format + " is not supported.");
265 }
266 }
267 public Resolution(int w, int h, int omePx, int bitsPerPixel, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
268 {
269 x = w;
270 y = h;
271 sx = stageX;
272 sy = stageY;
273 sz = stageZ;
274 format = BioImage.GetPixelFormat(omePx, bitsPerPixel);
275 px = physX;
276 py = physY;
277 pz = physZ;
278 }
279 public Resolution(int w, int h, PixelFormat f, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
280 {
281 x = w;
282 y = h;
283 format = f;
284 sx = stageX;
285 sy = stageY;
286 sz = stageZ;
287 px = physX;
288 py = physY;
289 pz = physZ;
290 }
291 public Resolution Copy()
292 {
293 return new Resolution(x, y, format, px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz);
294 }
295 public override string ToString()
296 {
297 return "(" + x + ", " + y + ") " + format.ToString() + " " + (SizeInBytes / 1000) + " KB";
298 }
299 }
300 /* Declaring a struct named RectangleD. */
301 public struct RectangleD
302 {
303 private double x;
304 private double y;
305 private double w;
306 private double h;
307 public double X { get { return x; } set { x = value; } }
308 public double Y { get { return y; } set { y = value; } }
309 public double W { get { return w; } set { w = value; } }
310 public double H { get { return h; } set { h = value; } }
311
312 public RectangleD(double X, double Y, double W, double H)
313 {
314 x = X;
315 y = Y;
316 w = W;
317 h = H;
318 }
319 public Rectangle ToRectangleInt()
320 {
321 return new Rectangle((int)X, (int)Y, (int)W, (int)H);
322 }
329 public bool IntersectsWith(RectangleD rect1)
330 {
331 if (rect1.X + rect1.W < X || X + W < rect1.X ||
332 rect1.Y + rect1.H < Y || Y + H < rect1.Y)
333 {
334 return false;
335 }
336 return true;
337 }
343 public bool IntersectsWith(PointD p)
344 {
345 return IntersectsWith(p.X, p.Y);
346 }
353 public bool IntersectsWith(double x, double y)
354 {
355 if (X <= x && (X + W) >= x && Y <= y && (Y + H) >= y)
356 return true;
357 else
358 return false;
359 }
363 public RectangleF ToRectangleF()
364 {
365 return new RectangleF((float)X, (float)Y, (float)W, (float)H);
366 }
371 public override string ToString()
372 {
373 double w = Math.Round(W, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
374 double h = Math.Round(H, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
375 double x = Math.Round(X, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
376 double y = Math.Round(Y, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
377 return x + ", " + y + ", " + w + ", " + h;
378 }

383 public class ROI
384 {
385 /* Defining an enum. */
386 public enum Type
387 {
388 Rectangle,
389 Point,
390 Line,
391 Polygon,
392 Polyline,
393 Freeform,
394 Ellipse,
395 Label,
396 Mask
397 }
398 /* A property of a class. */
399 public PointD Point
400 {
401 get
402 {
403 if (Points.Count == 0)
404 return new PointD(0, 0);
405 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Ellipse || type == Type.Label || type == Type.Freeform)
406 return new PointD(BoundingBox.X, BoundingBox.Y);
407 return Points[0];
408 }
409 set
410 {
411 if (Points.Count == 0)
412 {
413 AddPoint(value);
414 }
415 else
416 UpdatePoint(value, 0);
417 UpdateBoundingBox();
418 }
419 }
420 public RectangleD Rect
421 {
422 get
423 {
424 if (Points.Count == 0)
425 return new RectangleD(0, 0, 0, 0);
426 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform || type == Type.Label)
427 return BoundingBox;
428 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
429 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, Points[1].X - Points[0].X, Points[2].Y - Points[0].Y);
430 else
431 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, 1, 1);
432 }
433 set
434 {
435 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform)
436 {
437 BoundingBox = value;
438 }
439 else
440 if (Points.Count < 4 && (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse))
441 {
442 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y));
443 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y));
444 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H));
445 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H));
446 }
447 else
448 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
449 {
450 Points[0] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y);
451 Points[1] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y);
452 Points[2] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H);
453 Points[3] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H);
454 }
455 UpdateBoundingBox();
456 }
457 }
458 public double X
459 {
460 get
461 {
462 return Point.X;
463 }
464 set
465 {
466 Rect = new RectangleD(value, Y, W, H);
467 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
468 }
469 }
470 public double Y
471 {
472 get
473 {
474 return Point.Y;
475 }
476 set
477 {
478 Rect = new RectangleD(X, value, W, H);
479 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
480 }
481 }
482 public double W
483 {
484 get
485 {
486 if (type == Type.Point)
487 return strokeWidth;
488 else
489 return BoundingBox.W;
490 }
491 set
492 {
493 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, value, H);
494 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
495 }
496 }
497 public double H
498 {
499 get
500 {
501 if (type == Type.Point)
502 return strokeWidth;
503 else
504 return BoundingBox.H;
505 }
506 set
507 {
508 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, W, value);
509 Recorder.AddLine("App.AddROI(" + BioImage.ROIToString(this) + ");");
510 }
511 }

514 get { return resolution; }

598 public ROI Copy(ZCT cord)
599 {
600 ROI copy = new ROI();
601 copy.type = type;
602 copy.id = id;
603 copy.roiID = roiID;
604 copy.roiName = roiName;
605 copy.text = text;
606 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
607 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
608 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
609 copy.Points.AddRange(Points);
610 copy.selected = selected;
611 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
612 copy.closed = closed;
613 copy.family = family;
614 copy.fontSize = fontSize;
615 copy.slant = slant;
616 copy.selectBoxs.AddRange(selectBoxs);
617 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
618 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
619 copy.coord = cord;
620 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;

664 public RectangleD[] GetSelectBoxes(double s)

857 public void RemovePoints(int[] indexs)
858 {
859 List<PointD> inds = new List<PointD>();
860 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
861 {
862 bool found = false;
863 for (int ind = 0; ind < indexs.Length; ind++)
864 {
865 if (indexs[ind] == i)
866 found = true;
867 }
868 if (!found)
869 inds.Add(Points[i]);
870 }
871 Points = inds;
872 UpdateBoundingBox();
873 }

887 public PointD[] stringToPoints(string s)
888 {
889 List<PointD> pts = new List<PointD>();
890 string[] ints = s.Split(' ');
891 for (int i = 0; i < ints.Length; i++)
892 {
893 string[] sints;
894 if (s.Contains("\t"))
895 sints = ints[i].Split('\t');
896 else
897 sints = ints[i].Split(',');
898 double x = double.Parse(sints[0], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
899 double y = double.Parse(sints[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
900 pts.Add(new PointD(x, y));
901 }
902 return pts.ToArray();
903 }
904
910 public string PointsToString(BioImage b)
911 {
912 string pts = "";
913 PointD[] ps = b.ToImageSpace(Points);
914 for (int j = 0; j < ps.Length; j++)
915 {
916 if (j == ps.Length - 1)
917 pts += ps[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
918 else
919 pts += ps[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + " ";
920 }
921 return pts;
922 }
925 public void UpdateBoundingBox()
926 {
927 PointD min = new PointD(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue);
928 PointD max = new PointD(double.MinValue, double.MinValue);
929 foreach (PointD p in Points)
930 {
931 if (min.X > p.X)
932 min.X = p.X;
933 if (min.Y > p.Y)
934 min.Y = p.Y;
935
936 if (max.X < p.X)
937 max.X = p.X;
938 if (max.Y < p.Y)
939 max.Y = p.Y;
940 }
941 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
942 r.X = min.X;
943 r.Y = min.Y;
944 r.W = max.X - min.X;
945 r.H = max.Y - min.Y;
946 if (r.W == 0)
947 r.W = 1;
948 if (r.H == 0)
949 r.H = 1;
950 BoundingBox = r;
951 }
952
953 public override string ToString()
954 {
955 double w = Math.Round(W, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
956 double h = Math.Round(H, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
957 double x = Math.Round(Point.X, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
958 double y = Math.Round(Point.Y, 2, MidpointRounding.ToZero);
959 return type.ToString() + ", " + Text + " (" + w + ", " + h + ") " + " (" + x + ", " + y + ") " + coord.ToString();
960 }

962 /* It's a class that holds a string, an IFilter, and a Type */
963 public class Filt
964 {
965 /* Defining an enum. */
966 public enum Type
967 {
968 Base = 0,
969 Base2 = 1,
970 InPlace = 2,
971 InPlace2 = 3,
972 InPlacePartial = 4,
973 Resize = 5,
974 Rotate = 6,
975 Transformation = 7,
976 Copy = 8
977 }
978 public string name;
979 public IFilter filt;
980 public Type type;
981 public Filt(string s, IFilter f, Type t)
982 {
983 name = s;
984 filt = f;
985 type = t;
986 }
987 }
988 public static class Filters
989 {
990 public static int[,] indexs;
996 public static Filt GetFilter(string name)
997 {
998 foreach (Filt item in filters)
999 {
1000 if (item.name == name)
1001 return item;
1002 }
1003 return null;
1004 }
1012 public static Filt GetFilter(int type, int index)
1013 {
1014 return filters[indexs[type, index]];
1015 }
1016 public static List<Filt> filters = new List<Filt>();
1025 public static BioImage Base(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1026 {
1027 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1028 if (!inPlace)
1029 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1030 try
1031 {
1032 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1033 BaseFilter fi = (BaseFilter)f.filt;
1034 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1035 {
1036 Bitmap bm = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1037 img.Buffers[i] = bm;
1038 }
1039 if (!inPlace)
1040 {
1041 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1042 }
1043 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Base(" + '"' + id +
1044 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1045 }
1046 catch (Exception e)
1047 {
1048 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1049 dialog.Show();
1050 }
1051 return img;
1052 }
1063 public static BioImage Base2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
1064 {
1065 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
1066 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
1067 if (!inPlace)
1068 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1069 try
1070 {
1071 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1072 BaseFilter2 fi = (BaseFilter2)f.filt;
1073 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1074 {
1075 fi.OverlayImage = c2.Buffers[i];
1076 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1077 }
1078 if (!inPlace)
1079 {
1080 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1081 }
1082 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Base2(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," +
1083 '"' + id2 + '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + ");");
1084 return img;
1085 }
1086 catch (Exception e)
1087 {
1088 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1089 dialog.Show();
1090 }
1091 return img;
1092 }

1213 public static BioImage Resize(string id, string name, bool inPlace, int w, int h)
1214 {
1215 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1216 if (!inPlace)
1217 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1218 try
1219 {
1220 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1221 BaseResizeFilter fi = (BaseResizeFilter)f.filt;
1222 fi.NewHeight = h;
1223 fi.NewWidth = w;
1224 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1225 {
1226 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1227 }
1228 if (!inPlace)
1229 {
1230 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1231 }
1232 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Resize(" + '"' + id +
1233 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
1234 }
1235 catch (Exception e)
1236 {
1237 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1238 dialog.Show();
1239 }

1254 public static BioImage Rotate(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle, int a, int r, int g, int b)
1255 {
1256 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1257 if (!inPlace)
1258 img = BioImage.Copy(Images.GetImage(id));
1259 try
1260 {
1261 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1262 BaseRotateFilter fi = (BaseRotateFilter)f.filt;
1263 fi.Angle = angle;
1264 fi.FillColor = Color.FromArgb(a, r, g, b);
1265 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1266 {
1267 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1268 }
1269 if (!inPlace)
1270 {
1271 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1272 }
1273 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Rotate(" + '"' + id +
1274 '"' + "," + '"' + name + '"' + "," + inPlace.ToString().ToLower() + "," + angle.ToString() + "," +
1275 a + "," + r + "," + g + "," + b + ");");
1276 }
1277 catch (Exception e)
1278 {
1279 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1280 dialog.Show();
1281 }
1282 return img;
1283
1284 }

1366 public static BioImage Crop(string id, double x, double y, double w, double h)
1367 {
1368 BioImage c = Images.GetImage(id);
1369 RectangleF r = c.ToImageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
1370 Rectangle rec = new Rectangle((int)r.X, (int)r.Y, (int)Math.Abs(r.Width), (int)Math.Abs(r.Height));
1371 BioImage img = BioImage.Copy(c, false);
1372 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1373 {
1374 img.Buffers[i].Crop(rec);
1375 }
1376 BioImage.AutoThreshold(img, true);
1377 if (img.bitsPerPixel > 8)
1378 img.StackThreshold(true);
1379 else
1380 img.StackThreshold(false);
1381 Recorder.AddLine("Filters.Crop(" + '"' + id + '"' + "," + x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");");
1382 //App.tabsView.AddTab(img);
1383 return img;
1384 }
1391 public static BioImage Crop(string id, RectangleD r)
1392 {
1393 return Crop(id, r.X, r.Y, r.W, r.H);
1394 }

1636 f = new Filt("RotateNearestNeighbor", new RotateNearestNeighbor(0), Filt.Type.Rotate);
1637 filters.Add(f);
1638
1639 //Transformation
1640 indexs[7, 0] = filters.Count;
1641 f = new Filt("Crop", new Crop(new Rectangle(0, 0, 0, 0)), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1642 filters.Add(f);
1643 indexs[7, 1] = filters.Count;
1644 f = new Filt("QuadrilateralTransformation", new QuadrilateralTransformation(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1645 filters.Add(f);
1646 //f = new Filt("QuadrilateralTransformationBilinear", new QuadrilateralTransformationBilinear(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1647 //filters.Add(f);
1648 //f = new Filt("QuadrilateralTransformationNearestNeighbor", new QuadrilateralTransformationNearestNeighbor(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1649 //filters.Add(f);
1650 indexs[7, 2] = filters.Count;
1651 f = new Filt("Shrink", new Shrink(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1652 filters.Add(f);
1653 indexs[7, 3] = filters.Count;
1654 f = new Filt("SimpleQuadrilateralTransformation", new SimpleQuadrilateralTransformation(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1655 filters.Add(f);
1656 indexs[7, 4] = filters.Count;
1657 f = new Filt("TransformFromPolar", new TransformFromPolar(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1658 filters.Add(f);
1659 indexs[7, 5] = filters.Count;
1660 f = new Filt("TransformToPolar", new TransformToPolar(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1661 filters.Add(f);
1662
1663 //BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter
1664 indexs[8, 0] = filters.Count;
1665 f = new Filt("BinaryDilatation3x3", new BinaryDilatation3x3(), Filt.Type.Copy);
1666 filters.Add(f);
1667 indexs[8, 1] = filters.Count;
1668 f = new Filt("BilateralSmoothing ", new BilateralSmoothing(), Filt.Type.Copy);
1669 filters.Add(f);
1670 indexs[8, 2] = filters.Count;
1671 f = new Filt("BinaryErosion3x3 ", new BinaryErosion3x3(), Filt.Type.Copy);
1672 filters.Add(f);
1673
1674 }

2100 public string GetString()
2101 {
2102 string s = "";
2103 s += "ImageJ=" + ImageJ + "\n";
2104 s += "images=" + images + "\n";
2105 s += "channels=" + channels.ToString() + "\n";
2106 s += "slices=" + slices.ToString() + "\n";
2107 s += "frames=" + frames.ToString() + "\n";
2108 s += "hyperstack=" + hyperstack.ToString() + "\n";
2109 s += "mode=" + mode.ToString() + "\n";
2110 s += "unit=" + unit.ToString() + "\n";
2111 s += "finterval=" + finterval.ToString() + "\n";
2112 s += "spacing=" + spacing.ToString() + "\n";
2113 s += "loop=" + loop.ToString() + "\n";
2114 s += "min=" + min.ToString() + "\n";
2115 s += "max=" + max.ToString() + "\n";

2121 public void SetString(string desc)
2122 {
2123 string[] lines = desc.Split(new string[] { "\r\n", "\r", "\n" }, StringSplitOptions.None);
2124 int maxlen = 20;
2125 for (int i = 0; i < lines.Length; i++)
2126 {
2127 if (i < maxlen)
2128 {
2129 string[] sp = lines[i].Split('=');
2130 if (sp[0] == "ImageJ")
2131 ImageJ = sp[1];
2132 if (sp[0] == "images")
2133 images = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2134 if (sp[0] == "channels")
2135 channels = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2136 if (sp[0] == "slices")
2137 slices = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2138 if (sp[0] == "frames")
2139 frames = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2140 if (sp[0] == "hyperstack")
2141 hyperstack = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2142 if (sp[0] == "mode")
2143 mode = sp[1];
2144 if (sp[0] == "unit")
2145 unit = sp[1];
2146 if (sp[0] == "finterval")
2147 finterval = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2148 if (sp[0] == "spacing")
2149 spacing = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2150 if (sp[0] == "loop")
2151 loop = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2152 if (sp[0] == "min")
2153 min = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2154 if (sp[0] == "max")
2155 max = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2156 if (sp[0] == "8bitcolor")
2157 bit8color = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2158 }
2159 else
2160 return;
2161 }
2162
2163 }
2164 }

2299 public void To8Bit()
2300 {
2301 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2302 To24Bit();
2303 PixelFormat px = Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
2304 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2305 return;
2306 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2307 {
2308 To24Bit();
2309 List<AForge.Bitmap> bfs = new List<AForge.Bitmap>();
2310 int index = 0;
2311 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2312 {
2313 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2314 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2315 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2316 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2317 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2318 {
2319 bs[b].Dispose();
2320 }
2321 bs = null;
2322 GC.Collect();
2323 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2324 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2325 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2326 bfs.Add(br);
2327 bfs.Add(bg);
2328 bfs.Add(bb);
2329 index += 3;
2330 }
2331 Buffers = bfs;
2332 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2333 }
2334 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2335 {
2336 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2337 int index = 0;
2338 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2339 {
2340 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2341 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2342 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2343 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2344 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2345 {
2346 bs[b].Dispose();
2347 bs[b] = null;
2348 }
2349 bs = null;
2350 GC.Collect();
2351 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2352 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2353 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2354 bfs.Add(br);
2355 bfs.Add(bg);
2356 bfs.Add(bb);
2357 index += 3;
2358 }
2359 Buffers = bfs;
2360 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2361 }
2362 else
2363 {
2364 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2365 {
2366 Bitmap b = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2367 Buffers[i] = b;
2368 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
2369 }
2370 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2371 {
2372 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
2373 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2374 {
2375 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2376 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2377 }
2378 }
2379
2380 }
2381 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
2382 do
2383 {
2384 Thread.Sleep(100);
2385 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
2386 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
2387 AutoThreshold(this, false);
2388 bitsPerPixel = 8;
2389 App.viewer.UpdateGUI();
2390 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
2391 App.viewer.UpdateView();
2392 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.Table.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To8Bit();");
2393 }
2395 public void To16Bit()
2396 {
2397 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2398 To24Bit();
2399 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2400 return;
2401 bitsPerPixel = 16;
2402 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2403 {
2404 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2405 int index = 0;
2406 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2407 {
2408 Array.Reverse(Buffers[i].Bytes);
2409 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2410 bfs.AddRange(bs);
2411 index += 3;
2412 }
2413 Buffers = bfs;
2414 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, SizeC * 3, SizeT);
2415 if (Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel == 3)
2416 {
2417 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
2418 c.SamplesPerPixel = 1;
2419 c.range = new IntRange[1];
2420 Channels.Clear();
2421 Channels.Add(c);
2422 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
2423 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
2424 Channels[1].Index = 1;
2425 Channels[2].Index = 2;
2426 }
2427 }
2428 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2429 {
2430 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2431 {
2432 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
2433 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
2434 }
2435 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2436 {
2437 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2438 {
2439 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2440 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2441 }
2442 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
2443 }
2444 }
2445 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2446 {
2447 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2448 int index = 0;
2449 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2450 {
2451 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2452 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2].Image, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2453 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1].Image, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2454 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0].Image, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2455 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2456 {
2457 bs[b].Dispose();
2458 bs[b] = null;
2459 }
2460 bs = null;
2461 GC.Collect();
2462 br.To16Bit();
2463 bg.To16Bit();
2464 bb.To16Bit();
2465 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2466 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2467 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2468 bfs.Add(br);
2469 bfs.Add(bg);
2470 bfs.Add(bb);
2471 index += 3;
2472 }
2473 Buffers = bfs;
2474 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2475 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2476 {
2477 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2478 {
2479 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2480 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2481 }
2482 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
2483 }
2484 }
2485 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
2486 do
2487 {
2488 Thread.Sleep(100);
2489 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
2490 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
2491 AutoThreshold(this, false);
2492 StackThreshold(true);
2493 App.viewer.UpdateGUI();
2494 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
2495 App.viewer.UpdateView();
2496 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.Images.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To16Bit();");
2497 }
2499 public void To24Bit()
2500 {
2501 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2502 return;
2503 bitsPerPixel = 8;
2504 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb)
2505 {
2506 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2507 {
2508 Buffers[i] = Bitmap.To24Bit(Buffers[i]);
2509 Buffers[i].SwitchRedBlue();
2510 }
2511 if (Channels.Count == 4)
2512 {
2513 Channels.RemoveAt(0);
2514 }
2515 else
2516 {
2517 Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel = 3;
2518 }
2519 }
2520 else
2521 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2522 {
2523 //We run 8bit so we get 24 bit rgb.
2524 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2525 {
2526 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2527 }
2528 }
2529 else
2530 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2531 {
2532 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2533 {
2534 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2535 {
2536 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2537 }
2538 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2539 {
2540 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2541 {
2542 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2543 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2544 }
2545 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
2546 }
2547 }
2548 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2549 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
2550 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2551 {
2552 Bitmap bs = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2553 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bs);
2554 bs.Dispose();
2555 bs = null;
2556 bfs.Add(bbs);
2557 }
2558 else
2559 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
2560 {
2561 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
2562 bs[2] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2563 bs[1] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
2564 if (Channels.Count > 2)
2565 bs[0] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.T), i + 2, Buffers[i + 2].Plane);
2566 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB8To24(bs);
2567 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2568 {
2569 if (bs[b] != null)
2570 bs[b].Dispose();
2571 bs[b] = null;
2572 }
2573 bfs.Add(bbs);
2574 }
2575 Buffers = bfs;
2576 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
2577 }
2578 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.Images.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To24Bit();");
2579 AutoThreshold(this, true);
2580 StackThreshold(false);
2581 App.viewer.UpdateGUI();
2582 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
2583 App.viewer.UpdateView();
2584 }
2586 public void To32Bit()
2587 {
2588 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
2589 return;
2590 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat != PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2591 {
2592 To24Bit();
2593 }
2594 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2595 {
2596 UnmanagedImage b = Bitmap.To32Bit(Buffers[i]);
2597 Buffers[i].Image = b;
2598 }
2599 AutoThreshold(this, true);
2600 App.viewer.UpdateGUI();
2601 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
2602 App.viewer.UpdateView();
2603 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.Images.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To32Bit();");
2604 }
2608 public void To48Bit()
2609 {
2610 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2611 To24Bit();
2612 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2613 return;
2614 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2615 {
2616 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2617 {
2618 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2619 {
2620 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
2621 }
2622 }
2623 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2624 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
2625 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2626 {
2627 Bitmap bs = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2628 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bs);
2629 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
2630 bs.Dispose();
2631 bs = null;
2632 bfs.Add(bbs);
2633 }
2634 else
2635 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
2636 {
2637 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
2638 bs[0] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2639 bs[1] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
2640 if (Channels.Count > 2)
2641 bs[2] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i+2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i+2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i+2].Coordinate.T), i+2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2642 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bs);
2643 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2644 {
2645 if (bs[b] != null)
2646 bs[b].Dispose();
2647 bs[b] = null;
2648 }
2649 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbs);
2650 bfs.Add(bbs);
2651 }
2652 GC.Collect();
2653 Buffers = bfs;
2654 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
2655 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
2656 c.SamplesPerPixel = 3;
2657 rgbChannels[0] = 0;
2658 rgbChannels[1] = 0;
2659 rgbChannels[2] = 0;
2660 Channels.Clear();
2661 Channels.Add(c);
2662 }
2663 else
2664 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2665 {
2666 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2667 {
2668 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
2669 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
2670 }
2671 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2672 {
2673 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2674 {
2675 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2676 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2677 }
2678 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
2679 }
2680 }
2681 else
2682 {
2683 int index = 0;
2684 List<Bitmap> buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
2685 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += 3)
2686 {
2687 Bitmap[] bf = new Bitmap[3];
2688 bf[0] = Buffers[i];
2689 bf[1] = Buffers[i + 1];
2690 bf[2] = Buffers[i + 2];
2691 Bitmap inf = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bf);
2692 buffers.Add(inf);
2693 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
2694 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2695 {
2696 bf[b].Dispose();
2697 }
2698 index++;
2699 }
2700 Buffers = buffers;
2701 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
2702 }
2703 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
2704 do
2705 {
2706 Thread.Sleep(50);
2707 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
2708 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
2709 bitsPerPixel = 16;
2710 AutoThreshold(this, false);
2711 StackThreshold(true);
2712 App.viewer.UpdateGUI();
2713 App.viewer.UpdateImages();
2714 App.viewer.UpdateView();
2715 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.Images.GetImage(" + '"' + ID + '"' + ")" + "." + "To48Bit();");
2716 }
2717 public int? MacroResolution { get;set; }
2718 public int? LabelResolution { get;set; }
2719 void SetLabelMacroResolutions()
2720 {
2721 int i = 0;
2722 AForge.Size s = new AForge.Size(int.MaxValue, int.MaxValue);
2723 bool noMacro = true;
2724 PixelFormat pf = Resolutions[0].PixelFormat;
2725 foreach (Resolution res in Resolutions)
2726 {
2727 if (res.SizeX < s.Width && res.SizeY < s.Height)
2728 {
2729 //If the pixel format changes it means this is the macro resolution.
2730 if (pf != res.PixelFormat)
2731 {
2732 noMacro = false;
2733 break;
2734 }
2735 pf = res.PixelFormat;
2736 s = new AForge.Size(res.SizeX, res.SizeY);
2737 }
2738 else
2739 {
2740 //If this level is bigger than the previous this is the macro resolution.
2741 noMacro = false;
2742 break;
2743 }
2744 i++;
2745 }
2746 if (!noMacro)
2747 {
2748 MacroResolution = i;
2749 LabelResolution = i + 1;
2750 }
2751 }

2755 {

2757 }
2758 Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ), new Point3D(PhysicalSizeX * SizeX, PhysicalSizeY * SizeY, PhysicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
2759 }
2768 public void Bake(int rmin, int rmax, int gmin, int gmax, int bmin, int bmax)

2778 public void Bake(IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
2779 {
2780 BioImage bm = new BioImage(Images.GetImageName(ID));
2781 bm = CopyInfo(this, true, true);
2782 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2783 {
2784 ZCT co = Buffers[i].Coordinate;
2785 UnmanagedImage b = GetFiltered(i, rf, gf, bf);
2786 Bitmap inf = new Bitmap(bm.ID, b, co, i);
2787 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
2788 bm.Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = i;
2789 bm.Buffers.Add(inf);
2790 }
2791 foreach (Channel item in bm.Channels)
2792 {
2793 for (int i = 0; i < item.range.Length; i++)
2794 {
2795 item.range[i].Min = 0;
2796 if (bm.bitsPerPixel > 8)
2797 item.range[i].Max = ushort.MaxValue;
2798 else
2799 item.range[i].Max = 255;
2800 }
2801 }
2802 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
2803 do
2804 {
2805 Thread.Sleep(50);
2806 } while (Buffers[Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
2807 AutoThreshold(bm, false);
2808 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
2809 Images.AddImage(bm, true);
2810 App.tabsView.AddTab(bm);
2811 Recorder.AddLine("ImageView.SelectedImage.Bake(" + rf.Min + "," + rf.Max + "," + gf.Min + "," + gf.Max + "," + bf.Min + "," + bf.Max + ");");
2812 }
2814 public void UpdateCoords()
2815 {
2816 int z = 0;
2817 int c = 0;
2818 int t = 0;
2819 Coords = new int[SizeZ, SizeC, SizeT];
2820 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
2821 {
2822 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
2823 Coords[co.Z, co.C, co.T] = im;
2824 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
2825 if (c < SizeC - 1)
2826 c++;
2827 else
2828 {
2829 c = 0;
2830 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
2831 z++;
2832 else
2833 {
2834 z = 0;
2835 if (t < SizeT - 1)
2836 t++;
2837 else
2838 t = 0;
2839 }
2840 }
2841 }
2842 }

3200 public static BioImage Substack(BioImage orig, int ser, int zs, int ze, int cs, int ce, int ts, int te)
3201 {
3202 BioImage b = CopyInfo(orig, false, false);
3203 b.ID = Images.GetImageName(orig.ID);
3204 int i = 0;
3205 b.Coords = new int[ze - zs, ce - cs, te - ts];
3206 b.sizeZ = ze - zs;
3207 b.sizeC = ce - cs;
3208 b.sizeT = te - ts;
3209 for (int ti = 0; ti < b.SizeT; ti++)
3210 {
3211 for (int zi = 0; zi < b.SizeZ; zi++)
3212 {
3213 for (int ci = 0; ci < b.SizeC; ci++)
3214 {
3215 int ind = orig.Coords[zs + zi, cs + ci, ts + ti];
3216 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(Images.GetImageName(orig.id), orig.SizeX, orig.SizeY, orig.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, orig.Buffers[ind].Bytes, new ZCT(zi, ci, ti), i);
3217 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
3218 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
3219 b.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
3220 i++;
3221 }
3222 }
3223 }
3224 for (int ci = cs; ci < ce; ci++)
3225 {
3226 b.Channels.Add(orig.Channels[ci]);
3227 }
3228 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3229 do
3230 {
3231 Thread.Sleep(100);
3232 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3233 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3234 b.Resolutions.Add(new BioGTK.Resolution(b.Buffers[0].SizeX, b.Buffers[0].SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.PhysicalSizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ, b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ));
3235 AutoThreshold(b, false);
3236 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3237 b.StackThreshold(true);
3238 else
3239 b.StackThreshold(false);
3240 Images.AddImage(b, true);
3241 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.BioImage.Substack(" + '"' + orig.Filename + '"' + "," + ser + "," + zs + "," + ze + "," + cs + "," + ce + "," + ts + "," + te + ");");
3242 return b;
3243 }
3250 public static BioImage MergeChannels(BioImage b2, BioImage b)
3251 {
3252 BioImage res = new BioImage(b2.ID);
3253 res.ID = Images.GetImageName(b2.ID);
3254 res.series = b2.series;
3255 res.sizeZ = b2.SizeZ;
3256 int cOrig = b2.SizeC;
3257 res.sizeC = b2.SizeC + b.SizeC;
3258 res.sizeT = b2.SizeT;
3259 res.bitsPerPixel = b2.bitsPerPixel;
3260 res.imageInfo = b2.imageInfo;
3261 res.littleEndian = b2.littleEndian;
3262 res.seriesCount = b2.seriesCount;
3263 res.imagesPerSeries = res.ImageCount / res.seriesCount;
3264 res.Coords = new int[res.SizeZ, res.SizeC, res.SizeT];
3265
3266 int i = 0;
3267 int cc = 0;
3268 for (int ti = 0; ti < res.SizeT; ti++)
3269 {
3270 for (int zi = 0; zi < res.SizeZ; zi++)
3271 {
3272 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
3273 {
3274 ZCT co = new ZCT(zi, ci, ti);
3275 if (ci < cOrig)
3276 {
3277 //If this channel is part of the image b1 we add planes from it.
3278 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b2.id, b2.SizeX, b2.SizeY, b2.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b2.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
3279 if (b2.littleEndian)
3280 copy.RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3281 res.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
3282 res.Buffers.Add(b2.Buffers[i]);
3283 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
3284 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
3285 List<ROI> anns = b2.GetAnnotations(zi, ci, ti);
3286 if (anns.Count > 0)
3287 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
3288 }
3289 else
3290 {
3291 //This plane is not part of b1 so we add the planes from b2 channels.
3292 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b.id, b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
3293 if (b2.littleEndian)
3294 copy.RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3295 res.Coords[zi, ci, ti] = i;
3296 res.Buffers.Add(b.Buffers[i]);
3297 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
3298
3299 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
3300 List<ROI> anns = b.GetAnnotations(zi, cc, ti);
3301 if (anns.Count > 0)
3302 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
3303 }
3304 i++;
3305 }
3306 }
3307 }
3308 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
3309 {
3310 if (ci < cOrig)
3311 {
3312 res.Channels.Add(b2.Channels[ci].Copy());
3313 }
3314 else
3315 {
3316 res.Channels.Add(b.Channels[cc].Copy());
3317 res.Channels[cOrig + cc].Index = ci;
3318 cc++;
3319 }
3320 }
3321 Images.AddImage(res, true);
3322 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3323 do
3324 {
3325 Thread.Sleep(100);
3326 } while (res.Buffers[res.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3327 AutoThreshold(res, false);
3328 if (res.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3329 res.StackThreshold(true);
3330 else
3331 res.StackThreshold(false);
3332 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.BioImage.MergeChannels(" + '"' + b.ID + '"' + "," + '"' + b2.ID + '"' + ");");
3333 return res;
3334 }

3344 BioImage b2 = Images.GetImage(b2name);

3439 public BioImage[] SplitChannels()
3440 {
3441 BioImage[] bms;
3442 if (isRGB)
3443 {
3444 bms = new BioImage[3];
3445 BioImage ri = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-1" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3446 BioImage gi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-2" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3447 BioImage bi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-3" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3448 ri.sizeC = 1;
3449 gi.sizeC = 1;
3450 bi.sizeC = 1;
3451 ri.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3452 gi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3453 bi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3454 ri.sizeT = SizeT;
3455 gi.sizeT = SizeT;
3456 bi.sizeT = SizeT;
3457
3458 ri.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3459 gi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3460 bi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3461 int ind = 0;
3462 for (int i = 0; i < ImageCount; i++)
3463 {
3464 if (Buffers[i].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3465 {
3466 //For 48bit images we need to use our own function as AForge won't give us a proper image.
3467 Bitmap[] bfs = Bitmap.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind, Buffers[i].Plane);
3468 ind += 3;
3469 ri.Buffers.Add(bfs[0]);
3470 gi.Buffers.Add(bfs[1]);
3471 bi.Buffers.Add(bfs[2]);
3472 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[0]);
3473 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[1]);
3474 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[2]);
3475 ri.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3476 gi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3477 bi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3478 }
3479 else
3480 {
3481
3482 Bitmap rImage = extractR.Apply(Buffers[i]);
3483 Bitmap rbf = new Bitmap(ri.ID, rImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
3484 Statistics.CalcStatistics(rbf);
3485 ri.Buffers.Add(rbf);
3486 ri.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3487
3488 Bitmap gImage = extractG.Apply(Buffers[i]);
3489 Bitmap gbf = new Bitmap(gi.ID, gImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
3490 Statistics.CalcStatistics(gbf);
3491 gi.Buffers.Add(gbf);
3492 gi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3493
3494 Bitmap bImage = extractB.Apply(Buffers[i]);
3495 //Clipboard.SetImage(bImage);
3496 Bitmap bbf = new Bitmap(bi.ID, bImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
3497 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbf);
3498 bi.Buffers.Add(bbf);
3499 bi.Coords[Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T] = i;
3500
3501 }
3502 }
3503 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3504 do
3505 {
3506 Thread.Sleep(100);
3507 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3508 ri.Resolutions.Add(new BioGTK.Resolution(Buffers[0].SizeX, Buffers[0].SizeY, Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
3509 gi.Resolutions.Add(new BioGTK.Resolution(Buffers[0].SizeX, Buffers[0].SizeY, Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
3510 bi.Resolutions.Add(new BioGTK.Resolution(Buffers[0].SizeX, Buffers[0].SizeY, Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
3511 ri.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
3512 gi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
3513 bi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
3514 AutoThreshold(ri, false);
3515 AutoThreshold(gi, false);
3516 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
3517 Images.AddImage(ri, true);
3518 Images.AddImage(gi, true);
3519 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
3520 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3521 bms[0] = ri;
3522 bms[1] = gi;
3523 bms[2] = bi;
3524 }
3525 else
3526 {
3527 bms = new BioImage[SizeC];
3528 for (int c = 0; c < SizeC; c++)
3529 {
3530 BioImage b = BioImage.Substack(this, 0, 0, SizeZ, c, c + 1, 0, SizeT);
3531 bms[c] = b;
3532 }
3533 }
3534
3535 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3536 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.BioImage.SplitChannels(" + '"' + Filename + '"' + ");");
3537 return bms;
3538 }

3619 public int GetIndex(int ix, int iy)
3620 {
3621 if (ix > SizeX || iy > SizeY || ix < 0 || iy < 0)
3622 return 0;
3623 int stridex = SizeX;
3624 int x = ix;
3625 int y = iy;
3626 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
3627 {
3628 return (y * stridex + x) * 2;
3629 }
3630 else
3631 {
3632 return (y * stridex + x);
3633 }
3634 }
3642 public int GetIndexRGB(int ix, int iy, int index)
3643 {
3644 int stridex = SizeX;
3645 //For 16bit (2*8bit) images we multiply buffer index by 2
3646 int x = ix;
3647 int y = iy;
3648 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
3649 {
3650 return (y * stridex + x) * 2 * index;
3651 }
3652 else
3653 {
3654 return (y * stridex + x) * index;
3655 }
3656 }
3663 public ushort GetValue(ZCTXY coord)
3664 {
3665 if (coord.X < 0 || coord.Y < 0 || coord.X > SizeX || coord.Y > SizeY)
3666 {
3667 return 0;
3668 }
3669 if (isRGB)
3670 {
3671 if (coord.C == 0)
3672 return GetValueRGB(coord, 0);
3673 else if (coord.C == 1)
3674 return GetValueRGB(coord, 1);
3675 else if (coord.C == 2)
3676 return GetValueRGB(coord, 2);
3677 }
3678 else
3679 return GetValueRGB(coord, 0);
3680 return 0;
3681 }
3688 public ushort GetValueRGB(ZCTXY coord, int index)
3689 {
3690 int ind = 0;
3691 if (coord.C >= SizeC)
3692 {
3693 coord.C = 0;
3694 }
3695 ind = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
3696 ColorS c = Buffers[ind].GetPixel(coord.X, coord.Y);
3697 if (index == 0)
3698 return c.R;
3699 else
3700 if (index == 1)
3701 return c.G;
3702 else
3703 if (index == 2)
3704 return c.B;
3705 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException();
3706 }

3908 public Bitmap GetRGBBitmap(ZCT coord, IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
3909 {
3910 int index = Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
3911 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
3912 {
3913 if (Channels.Count >= 3)
3914 {
3915 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
3916 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
3917 bs[1] = Buffers[index + GChannel.Index];
3918 bs[0] = Buffers[index + BChannel.Index];
3919 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
3920 }
3921 else
3922 {
3923 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
3924 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
3925 bs[1] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 1];
3926 bs[0] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 2];
3927 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
3928 }
3929 }
3930 else
3931 return Buffers[index];
3932 }
3941 public static unsafe Bitmap GetBitmapRGB(int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts)
3942 {
3943 if (px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
3944 {
3945 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3946 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3947 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3948 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3949 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3950 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3951 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3952 {
3953 //getting the pixels of current row
3954 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3955 int rowRGB = y * w * 4;
3956 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3957 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3958 {
3959 int indexRGB = x * 4;
3960 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3961 row[indexRGBA + 3] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3];//byte A
3962 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
3963 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
3964 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
3965 }
3966 }
3967 //unlocking bits and disposing image
3968 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3969 return bmp;
3970 }
3971 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
3972 {
3973 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
3974 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
3975 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
3976 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
3977 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
3978 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
3979 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
3980 {
3981 //getting the pixels of current row
3982 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
3983 int rowRGB = y * w * 3;
3984 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
3985 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
3986 {
3987 int indexRGB = x * 3;
3988 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
3989 row[indexRGBA + 3] = byte.MaxValue;//byte A
3990 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
3991 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
3992 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
3993 }
3994 }
3995 //unlocking bits and disposing image
3996 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
3997 return bmp;
3998 }
3999 else
4000 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
4001 {
4002 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4003 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4004 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4005 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4006 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4007 unsafe
4008 {
4009 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4010 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4011 {
4012 //getting the pixels of current row
4013 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4014 int rowRGB = y * w * 6;
4015 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4016 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4017 {
4018 int indexRGB = x * 6;
4019 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4020 int b = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
4021 int g = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) / 255);
4022 int r = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) / 255);
4023 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
4024 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
4025 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
4026 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
4027 }
4028 }
4029 }
4030 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4031 return bmp;
4032 }
4033 else
4034 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
4035 {
4036 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4037 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4038 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4039 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4040 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4041 unsafe
4042 {
4043 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4044 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4045 {
4046 //getting the pixels of current row
4047 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4048 int rowRGB = y * w;
4049 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4050 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4051 {
4052 int indexRGB = x;
4053 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4054 byte b = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];
4055 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
4056 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
4057 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
4058 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
4059 }
4060 }
4061 }
4062 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4063 return bmp;
4064 }
4065 else
4066 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
4067 {
4068 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4069 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4070 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4071 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4072 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4073 unsafe
4074 {
4075 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4076 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4077 {
4078 //getting the pixels of current row
4079 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4080 int rowRGB = y * w * 2;
4081 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4082 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4083 {
4084 int indexRGB = x * 2;
4085 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4086 ushort b = (ushort)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
4087 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
4088 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
4089 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
4090 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
4091 }
4092 }
4093 }
4094 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4095 return bmp;
4096 }
4097
4098 throw new NotSupportedException("Pixelformat " + px + " is not supported.");
4099 }

4107 public List<ROI> GetAnnotations(ZCT coord)

4111 {
4112 if (an == null)

4131 {
4132 if (an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.C == C && an.coord.T == T)
4133 annotations.Add(an);

4140 public static void Initialize()

4143 //view images.

4147 t.Start();
4148 System.Threading.Thread t3 = new System.Threading.Thread(new System.Threading.ThreadStart(InitReader));
4149 t3.Start();
4150 System.Threading.Thread t4 = new System.Threading.Thread(new System.Threading.ThreadStart(InitWriter));
4151 t4.Start();

4153 else
4154 initialized = true;
4155 }

4197 public static void SaveSeries(string[] IDs, string file)
4198 {
4199 string desc = "";
4200 int stride = 0;
4201 ImageJDesc j = new ImageJDesc();
4202 BioImage bi = Images.GetImage(IDs[0]);
4203 j.FromImage(bi);
4204 desc = j.GetString();
4205 for (int fi = 0; fi < IDs.Length; fi++)
4206 {
4207 string id = IDs[fi];
4208 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(id);
4209 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(id);
4210 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(file);
4211 stride = b.Buffers[0].Stride;
4212
4213 //Save ROIs to CSV file.
4214 if (b.Annotations.Count > 0)
4215 {
4216 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
4217 ExportROIsCSV(f, b.Annotations);
4218 }
4219
4220 //Embed ROI's to image description.
4221 for (int i = 0; i < b.Annotations.Count; i++)
4222 {
4223 desc += "-ROI:" + b.series + ":" + ROIToString(b.Annotations[i]) + NewLine;
4224 }
4225 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
4226 {
4227 string cj = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(c.info, Formatting.None);
4228 desc += "-Channel:" + fi + ":" + cj + NewLine;
4229 }
4230 string json = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(b.imageInfo, Formatting.None);
4231 desc += "-ImageInfo:" + fi + ":" + json + NewLine;
4232 }
4233
4234 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "w");
4235 for (int fi = 0; fi < IDs.Length; fi++)
4236 {
4237 int im = 0;
4238 string id = IDs[fi];
4239 Progress pr = Progress.Create(file, "Saving TIFF", "Writing");
4240 pr.Show();
4241 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(id);
4242 int sizec = 1;
4243 if (!b.isRGB)
4244 {
4245 sizec = b.SizeC;
4246 }
4247 byte[] buffer;
4248 for (int c = 0; c < sizec; c++)
4249 {
4250 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
4251 {
4252 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
4253 {
4254 image.SetDirectory((short)(im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi)));
4255 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH, b.SizeX);
4256 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION, desc);
4257 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH, b.SizeY);
4258 image.SetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE, b.bitsPerPixel);
4259 image.SetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL, b.RGBChannelCount);
4260 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, b.SizeY);
4261 image.SetField(TiffTag.ORIENTATION, BitMiracle.LibTiff.Classic.Orientation.TOPLEFT);
4262 image.SetField(TiffTag.PLANARCONFIG, PlanarConfig.CONTIG);
4263 image.SetField(TiffTag.PHOTOMETRIC, Photometric.MINISBLACK);
4264 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, image.DefaultStripSize(0));
4265 if (b.PhysicalSizeX != -1 && b.PhysicalSizeY != -1)
4266 {
4267 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) / ((b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) * b.PhysicalSizeX));
4268 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) / ((b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) * b.PhysicalSizeY));
4269 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.NONE);
4270 }
4271 else
4272 {
4273 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, 100.0);
4274 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, 100.0);
4275 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.INCH);
4276 }
4277 // specify that it's a page within the multipage file
4278 image.SetField(TiffTag.SUBFILETYPE, FileType.PAGE);
4279 // specify the page number
4280 buffer = b.Buffers[im].GetSaveBytes(true);
4281 image.SetField(TiffTag.PAGENUMBER, im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi), b.Buffers.Count * IDs.Length);
4282 for (int i = 0, offset = 0; i < b.SizeY; i++)
4283 {
4284 image.WriteScanline(buffer, offset, i, 0);
4285 offset += stride;
4286 }
4287 image.WriteDirectory();
4288 pr.ProgressValue = (float)im / (float)b.ImageCount;
4289 im++;
4290 }
4291 }
4292 }
4293 pr.Hide();
4294 }
4295 image.Dispose();
4296
4297 }
4304 public static BioImage[] OpenSeries(string file, bool tab)
4305 {
4306 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
4307 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories();
4308 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
4309 int sp = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
4310 ImageJDesc imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
4311 int count = 1;
4312 if (f != null)
4313 {
4314 string desc = f[0].ToString();
4315 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
4316 {
4317 imDesc.SetString(desc);
4318 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
4319 count = imDesc.channels;
4320 }
4321 }
4322 int scount = (pages * sp) / count;
4323 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[pages];
4324 image.Close();
4325 for (int i = 0; i < pages; i++)
4326 {
4327 bs[i] = OpenFile(file, i, tab, true);
4328 }
4329 return bs;
4330 }

4356 static bool IsTiffTiled(string imagePath)
4357 {
4358 if (imagePath.EndsWith(".tif") || imagePath.EndsWith(".tiff"))
4359 {
4360 using (Tiff tiff = Tiff.Open(imagePath, "r"))
4361 {
4362 if (tiff == null)
4363 {
4364 throw new Exception("Failed to open TIFF image.");
4365 }
4366 bool t = tiff.IsTiled();
4367 tiff.Close();
4368 return t;
4369 }
4370 }
4371 else return false;
4372 }
4382 static void InitDirectoryResolution(BioImage b, Tiff image, ImageJDesc jdesc = null)
4383 {
4384 Resolution res = new Resolution();
4385 FieldValue[] rs = image.GetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT);
4386 string unit = "NONE";
4387 if (rs != null)
4388 unit = rs[0].ToString();
4389 if (jdesc != null)
4390 res.PhysicalSizeZ = jdesc.finterval;
4391 else
4392 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
4393 if (unit == "CENTIMETER")
4394 {
4395 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
4396 {
4397 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4398 res.PhysicalSizeX = (1000 / x);
4399 }
4400 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
4401 {
4402 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4403 res.PhysicalSizeY = (1000 / y);
4404 }
4405 }
4406 else
4407 if (unit == "INCH")
4408 {
4409 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
4410 {
4411 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4412 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
4413 }
4414 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
4415 {
4416 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4417 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
4418 }
4419 }
4420 else
4421 if (unit == "NONE")
4422 {
4423 if (jdesc != null)
4424 {
4425 if (jdesc.unit == "micron")
4426 {
4427 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
4428 {
4429 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4430 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
4431 }
4432 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
4433 {
4434 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4435 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
4436 }
4437 }
4438 }
4439 else
4440 {
4441 res.PhysicalSizeX = 2.54 / 96;
4442 res.PhysicalSizeY = 2.54 / 96;
4443 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
4444 }
4445 }
4446 res.SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
4447 res.SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
4448 int bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
4449 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
4450 res.PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, bitsPerPixel);
4451 b.Resolutions.Add(res);
4452 }

4479 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool tab, bool addToImages, bool tile, int tileX, int tileY, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
4480 {
4481 string fs = file.Replace("\\", "/");
4482 vips = VipsSupport(file);
4483 Console.WriteLine("Opening BioImage: " + file);
4484 bool ome = isOME(file);
4485 if (ome) return OpenOME(file, series, tab, addToImages, tile, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
4486 bool tiled = IsTiffTiled(file);
4487 Console.WriteLine("IsTiled=" + tiled.ToString());
4488 tile = tiled;
4489
4490 Stopwatch st = new Stopwatch();
4491 st.Start();
4492 status = "Opening Image";
4493 progFile = file;
4494 progressValue = 0;
4495 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
4496 if(tiled && file.EndsWith(".tif") && !file.EndsWith(".ome.tif"))
4497 {
4498 //To open this we need libvips
4499 vips = VipsSupport(b.file);
4500 }
4501 b.series = series;
4502 b.file = file;
4503 b.ispyramidal = tiled;
4504 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(file);
4505 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(file);
4506 if (File.Exists(fn + ".csv"))
4507 {
4508 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
4509 b.Annotations = BioImage.ImportROIsCSV(f);
4510 }
4511 if (file.EndsWith("tif") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIF") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
4512 {
4513 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
4514 b.tifRead = image;
4515 int SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
4516 int SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
4517 b.bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
4518 b.littleEndian = !image.IsBigEndian();
4519 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
4520 string desc = "";
4521
4522 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
4523 desc = f[0].ToString();
4524 ImageJDesc imDesc = null;
4525 b.sizeC = 1;
4526 b.sizeT = 1;
4527 b.sizeZ = 1;
4528 if (f != null && !tile)
4529 {
4530 imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
4531 desc = f[0].ToString();
4532 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
4533 {
4534 imDesc.SetString(desc);
4535 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
4536 b.sizeC = imDesc.channels;
4537 else
4538 b.sizeC = 1;
4539 if (imDesc.slices != 0)
4540 b.sizeZ = imDesc.slices;
4541 else
4542 b.sizeZ = 1;
4543 if (imDesc.frames != 0)
4544 b.sizeT = imDesc.frames;
4545 else
4546 b.sizeT = 1;
4547 if (imDesc.finterval != 0)
4548 b.frameInterval = imDesc.finterval;
4549 else
4550 b.frameInterval = 1;
4551 if (imDesc.spacing != 0)
4552 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = imDesc.spacing;
4553 else
4554 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
4555 }
4556 }
4557 int stride = 0;
4558 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
4559 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
4560 {
4561 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
4562 {
4563 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
4564 stride = SizeX * 2;
4565 }
4566 else
4567 {
4568 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
4569 stride = SizeX;
4570 }
4571 }
4572 else
4573 if (RGBChannelCount == 3)
4574 {
4575 b.sizeC = 1;
4576 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
4577 {
4578 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
4579 stride = SizeX * 2 * 3;
4580 }
4581 else
4582 {
4583 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
4584 stride = SizeX * 3;
4585 }
4586 }
4587 else
4588 {
4589 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
4590 stride = SizeX * 4;
4591 }
4592
4593 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
4594 int index = 0;
4595 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
4596 {
4597 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-Channel"))
4598 {
4599 string val = sts[i].Substring(9);
4600 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
4601 int serie = int.Parse(val);
4602 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
4603 {
4604 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
4605 Channel.ChannelInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<Channel.ChannelInfo>(cht);
4606 Channel ch = new Channel(index, b.bitsPerPixel, info.SamplesPerPixel);
4607 ch.info = info;
4608 b.Channels.Add(ch);
4609 if (index == 0)
4610 {
4611 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
4612 }
4613 else
4614 if (index == 1)
4615 {
4616 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
4617 }
4618 else
4619 if (index == 2)
4620 {
4621 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
4622 }
4623 index++;
4624 }
4625 }
4626 else
4627 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ROI"))
4628 {
4629 string val = sts[i].Substring(5);
4630 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
4631 int serie = int.Parse(val);
4632 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
4633 {
4634 string s = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4, sts[i].Length - (sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4));
4635 string ro = s.Substring(s.IndexOf(":") + 1, s.Length - (s.IndexOf(':') + 1));
4636 ROI roi = StringToROI(ro);
4637 b.Annotations.Add(roi);
4638 }
4639 }
4640 else
4641 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
4642 {
4643 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
4644 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
4645 int serie = int.Parse(val);
4646 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 10)
4647 {
4648 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
4649 b.imageInfo = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
4650 }
4651 }
4652 }
4653 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
4654 if (tiled && tileSizeX == 0 && tileSizeY == 0)
4655 {
4656 tileSizeX = 1920;
4657 tileSizeY = 1080;
4658 }
4659
4660 //If this is a tiff file not made by Bio we init channels based on RGBChannels.
4661 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
4662 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
4663
4664 //Lets check to see the channels are correctly defined in this file
4665 for (int ch = 0; ch < b.Channels.Count; ch++)
4666 {
4667 if (b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel != RGBChannelCount)
4668 {
4669 b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel = RGBChannelCount;
4670 }
4671 }
4672
4673 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
4674 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories() / b.seriesCount;
4675 int str = image.ScanlineSize();
4676 bool inter = true;
4677 if (stride != str)
4678 inter = false;
4679 InitDirectoryResolution(b, image, imDesc);
4680 if (tiled)
4681 {
4682 Console.WriteLine("Opening tiles.");
4683 if (vips)
4684 OpenVips(b, b.Resolutions.Count);
4685 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
4686 {
4687 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
4688 {
4689 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
4690 {
4691 Bitmap bmp = GetTile(b, new ZCT(z, c, t), series, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
4692 b.Buffers.Add(bmp);
4693 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bmp);
4694 }
4695 }
4696 }
4697 Console.WriteLine("Calculating statisitics.");
4698 }
4699 else
4700 {
4701 for (int p = series * pages; p < (series + 1) * pages; p++)
4702 {
4703 image.SetDirectory((short)p);
4704
4705 byte[] bytes = new byte[stride * SizeY];
4706 for (int im = 0, offset = 0; im < SizeY; im++)
4707 {
4708 image.ReadScanline(bytes, offset, im, 0);
4709 offset += stride;
4710 }
4711 Bitmap inf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, b.Resolutions[series].PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
4712 b.Buffers.Add(inf);
4713 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
4714 progressValue = (float)p / (float)(series + 1) * pages;
4715 }
4716 }
4717 image.Close();
4718 b.UpdateCoords();
4719 }
4720 else
4721 {
4722 Gdk.Pixbuf pf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(file);
4723 b.littleEndian = BitConverter.IsLittleEndian;
4724 PixelFormat px = GetPixelFormat(pf.NChannels, pf.BitsPerSample);
4725 b.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(pf.Width, pf.Height,px,96 * (1/2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000,0,0,0));
4726 b.bitsPerPixel = pf.BitsPerSample;
4727 b.Buffers.Add(new Bitmap(pf.Width, pf.Height, pf.Width * pf.NChannels, px, pf.Pixels));
4728 b.Buffers.Last().ID = Bitmap.CreateID(file, 0);
4729 Statistics.CalcStatistics(b.Buffers.Last());
4730 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, b.RGBChannelCount));
4731 b.Coords = new int[1, 1, 1];
4732 b.sizeC = 1;
4733 b.sizeT = 1;
4734 b.sizeZ = 1;
4735 }
4736 if (b.StageSizeX == -1)
4737 {
4738 b.imageInfo.Series = 0;
4739 b.StageSizeX = 0;
4740 b.StageSizeY = 0;
4741 b.StageSizeZ = 0;
4742 }
4743 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * b.SizeZ));
4744
4745 //If file is ome and we have OME support then check for annotation in metadata.
4746 if (ome)
4747 {
4748 b.Annotations.AddRange(OpenOMEROIs(file, series));
4749 }
4750
4751 //We wait for histogram image statistics calculation
4752 do
4753 {
4754 Thread.Sleep(50);
4755 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
4756 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
4757 AutoThreshold(b, false);
4758 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
4759 b.StackThreshold(true);
4760 else
4761 b.StackThreshold(false);
4762 Recorder.AddLine("BioGTK.BioImage.Open(" + '"' + file + '"' + ");");
4763 if (addToImages)
4764 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
4765 //pr.Close();
4766 //pr.Dispose();
4767 st.Stop();
4768 b.loadTimeMS = st.ElapsedMilliseconds;
4769 Console.WriteLine("BioImage loaded " + b.ToString());
4770 return b;
4771 }
4778 public static bool isTiffSeries(string file)
4779 {
4780 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
4781 string desc = "";
4782 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
4783 image.Close();
4784 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
4785 int index = 0;
4786 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
4787 {
4788 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
4789 {
4790 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
4791 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
4792 int serie = int.Parse(val);
4793 if (sts[i].Length > 10)
4794 {
4795 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
4796 ImageInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
4797 if (info.Series > 1)
4798 return true;
4799 else
4800 return false;
4801 }
4802 }
4803 }
4804 return false;
4805 }
4813 public static bool isOME(string file)
4814 {
4815 if (file.EndsWith("ome.tif") || file.EndsWith("ome.tiff"))
4816 {
4817 return true;
4818 }
4819 if (file.EndsWith(".tif") || file.EndsWith(".TIF") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
4820 {
4821 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
4822 string desc = "";
4823 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
4824 desc = f[0].ToString();
4825 image.Close();
4826 if (desc.Contains("OME-XML"))
4827 return true;
4828 else
4829 return false;
4830 }
4831 if ((file.EndsWith("png") || file.EndsWith("PNG") || file.EndsWith("jpg") || file.EndsWith("JPG") ||
4832 file.EndsWith("jpeg") || file.EndsWith("JPEG") || file.EndsWith("bmp") || file.EndsWith("BMP")))
4833 {
4834 return false;
4835 }
4836 else return true;
4837 }
4843 public static bool isOMESeries(string file)
4844 {
4845 if (!isOME(file))
4846 return false;
4847 ImageReader reader = new ImageReader();
4848 var meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
4849 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
4850 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
4851 reader.setId(file);
4852 bool ser = false;
4853 if (reader.getSeriesCount() > 1)
4854 ser = true;
4855 reader.close();
4856 reader = null;
4857 return ser;
4858 }

5126 {
