5128 omexml.setLabelID(an.id, i, serie);
5129 else
5130 omexml.setLabelID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5131 omexml.setLabelX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
5132 omexml.setLabelY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
5133 omexml.setLabelTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5134 omexml.setLabelTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5135 omexml.setLabelTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5136 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5137 if (an.Text != "")
5138 omexml.setLabelText(an.Text, i, serie);
5139 else
5140 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5141 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5142 omexml.setLabelFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5143 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5144 omexml.setLabelStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5145 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5146 omexml.setLabelStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5147 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5148 omexml.setLabelFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5149 }
5150 i++;
5151 }
5152
5153 if (b.Buffers[0].Plane != null && planes)
5154 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
5155 {
5156 //Correct order of parameters.
5157 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta != 0)
5158 {
5159 ome.units.quantity.Time t = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
5160 omexml.setPlaneDeltaT(t, serie, bu);
5161 }
5162 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure != 0)
5163 {
5164 ome.units.quantity.Time et = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
5165 omexml.setPlaneExposureTime(et, serie, bu);
5166 }
5167 ome.units.quantity.Length lx = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5168 ome.units.quantity.Length ly = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5169 ome.units.quantity.Length lz = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5170 omexml.setPlanePositionX(lx, serie, bu);
5171 omexml.setPlanePositionY(ly, serie, bu);
5172 omexml.setPlanePositionZ(lz, serie, bu);
5173 omexml.setPlaneTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
5174 omexml.setPlaneTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
5175 omexml.setPlaneTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
5176
5177 omexml.setTiffDataPlaneCount(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, bu);
5178 omexml.setTiffDataIFD(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(bu)), serie, bu);
5179 omexml.setTiffDataFirstC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
5180 omexml.setTiffDataFirstZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
5181 omexml.setTiffDataFirstT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
5182
5183 }
5184
5185 }
5186 writer.setMetadataRetrieve(omexml);
5187 f = f.Replace("\\", "/");
5188 writer.setId(f);
5189 status = "Saving OME Image Planes.";
5190 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
5191 {
5192 BioImage b = files[i];
5193 writer.setSeries(i);
5194 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
5195 {
5196 progressValue = (float)bu / (float)b.Buffers.Count;
5197 byte[] bts = b.Buffers[bu].GetSaveBytes(BitConverter.IsLittleEndian);
5198 writer.saveBytes(bu, bts);
5199 }
5200 }
5201 bool stop = false;
5202 do
5203 {
5204 try
5205 {
5206 writer.close();
5207 stop = true;
5208 }
5209 catch (Exception e)
5210 {
5211 //Scripting.LogLine(e.Message);
5212 }
5213
5214 } while (!stop);
5215 }
5227 private static int GetBands(PixelFormat format)
5228 {
5229 switch (format)
5230 {
5231 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed: return 1;
5232 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale: return 1;
5233 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb: return 3;
5234 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb:
5235 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppPArgb:
5236 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb:
5237 return 4;
5238 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb:
5239 return 3;
5240 default:
5241 throw new NotSupportedException($"Unsupported pixel format: {format}");
5242 }
5243 }
5254 public static void SaveOMEPyramidal(BioImage[] bms, string file, Enums.ForeignTiffCompression compression, int compressionLevel)
5255 {
5256 if (File.Exists(file))
5257 File.Delete(file);
5258 //We need to go through the images and find the ones belonging to each resolution.
5259 //As well we need to determine the dimensions of the tiles.
5260 Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>> bis = new Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>>();
5261 Dictionary<double, Point3D> min = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
5262 Dictionary<double, Point3D> max = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
5263 for (int i = 0; i < bms.Length; i++)
5264 {
5265 Resolution res = bms[i].Resolutions[bms[i].Resolution];
5266 if (bis.ContainsKey(res.PhysicalSizeX))
5267 {
5268 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
5269 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5270 {
5271 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5272 }
5273 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5274 {
5275 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5276 }
5277 }
5278 else
5279 {
5280 bis.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new List<BioImage>());
5281 min.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue));
5282 max.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MinValue, double.MinValue, double.MinValue));
5283 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5284 {
5285 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5286 }
5287 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5288 {
5289 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5290 }
5291 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
5292 }
5293 }
5294 int s = 0;
5295 //We determine the sizes of each resolution.
5296 Dictionary<double, AForge.Size> ss = new Dictionary<double, AForge.Size>();
5297 int minx = int.MaxValue;
5298 int miny = int.MaxValue;
5299 double last = 0;
5300 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
5301 {
5302 int xs = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].X - min[px].X) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth)) * bis[px][0].SizeX;
5303 int ys = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].Y - min[px].Y) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight)) * bis[px][0].SizeY;
5304 if (minx > xs)
5305 minx = xs;
5306 if (miny > ys)
5307 miny = ys;
5308 ss.Add(px, new AForge.Size(xs, ys));
5309 last = px;
5310 }
5311 s = 0;
5312 string met = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"no\"?>" +
5313 "<OME xmlns=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06\" " +
5314 "xmlns:xsi=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance\" " +
5315 "xsi:schemaLocation=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06 http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06/ome.xsd\">";
5316 NetVips.Image img = null;
5317 int ib = 0;
5318
5319 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
5320 {
5321 int c = bis[px][s].SizeC;
5322 if (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].isRGB)
5323 c = 3;
5324 string endian = (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].LittleEndian).ToString().ToLower();
5325 met +=
5326 "<Image ID=\"Image:" + ib + "\">" +
5327 "<Pixels BigEndian=\"" + endian + "\" DimensionOrder= \"XYCZT\" ID= \"Pixels:0\" Interleaved=\"true\" " +
5328 "PhysicalSizeX=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeX + "\" PhysicalSizeXUnit=\"µm\" PhysicalSizeY=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeY + "\" PhysicalSizeYUnit=\"µm\" SignificantBits=\"" + bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel + "\" " +
5329 "SizeC = \"" + c + "\" SizeT = \"" + bis[px][s].SizeT + "\" SizeX =\"" + ss[px].Width +
5330 "\" SizeY= \"" + ss[px].Height + "\" SizeZ=\"" + bis[px][s].SizeZ;
5331 if (bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel > 8) met += "\" Type= \"uint16\">";
5332 else met += "\" Type= \"uint8\">";
5333 int i = 0;
5334 foreach (Channel ch in bis[px][s].Channels)
5335 {
5336 met += "<Channel ID=\"Channel:" + ib + ":" + i + "\" SamplesPerPixel=\"1\"></Channel>";
5337 i++;
5338 }
5339 met += "</Pixels></Image>";
5340 ib++;
5341 }
5342 met += "</OME>";
5343 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
5344 {
5345 PixelFormat pf = bis[px][0].Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
5346 Bitmap level = new Bitmap(ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, pf);
5347 int bands = GetBands(pf);
5348 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
5349 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
5350 else
5351 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
5352 int i = 0;
5353 foreach (BioImage b in bis[px])
5354 {
5355 AForge.Size si = ss[px];
5356 double xs = (-(min[px].X - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.X) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth) * bis[px][i].SizeX;
5357 double ys = (-(min[px].Y - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.Y) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight) * bis[px][i].SizeY;
5358 NetVips.Image tile;
5359 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5360 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
5361 else
5362 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
5363 img = img.Insert(tile, (int)xs, (int)ys);
5364 i++;
5365 };
5366 using var mutated = img.Mutate(mutable =>
5367 {
5368 // Set the ImageDescription tag
5369 mutable.Set(GValue.GStrType, "image-description", met);
5370 mutable.Set(GValue.GIntType, "page-height", ss[last].Height);
5371 });
5372 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
5373 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 16,
5374 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
5375 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
5376 else
5377 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 8,
5378 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
5379 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
5380 s++;
5381 }
5382
5383 }

5421 public static BioImage FilesToStack(string[] files, int sizeZ, int sizeC, int sizeT)
5422 {
5423 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
5424 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
5425 {
5426 BioImage bb = OpenFile(files[i], false);
5427 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
5428 }
5429 b.UpdateCoords(sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT);
5430 Images.AddImage(b, true);
5431 return b;
5432 }
5438 public static BioImage FolderToStack(string path, bool tab)
5439 {
5440 string[] files = Directory.GetFiles(path);
5441 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
5442 int z = 0;
5443 int c = 0;
5444 int t = 0;
5445 BioImage bb = null;
5446 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
5447 {
5448 string[] st = files[i].Split('_');
5449 if (st.Length > 3)
5450 {
5451 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
5452 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
5453 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
5454 }
5455 bb = OpenFile(files[i], tab);
5456 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
5457 }
5458 if (z == 0)
5459 {
5460 /*TO DO
5461 ImagesToStack im = new ImagesToStack();
5462 if (im.ShowDialog() != DialogResult.OK)
5463 return null;
5464 b.UpdateCoords(im.SizeZ, im.SizeC, im.SizeT);
5465 */
5466 }
5467 else
5468 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
5469 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
5470 Recorder.AddLine("BioImage.FolderToStack(\"" + path + "\");");
5471 return b;
5472 }

5516 public static Bitmap ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(BioImage b, int x, int y, int width, int height, int res)
5517 {
5518 try
5519 {
5520 NetVips.Image subImage = b.vipPages[res].Crop(x, y, width, height);
5521 if (b.vipPages[res].Format == Enums.BandFormat.Uchar)
5522 {
5523 Bitmap bm;
5524 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
5525 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
5526 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
5527 else
5528 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
5529 return bm;
5530
5531 }
5532 else if (b.vipPages[res].Format == Enums.BandFormat.Ushort)
5533 {
5534 Bitmap bm;
5535 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
5536 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
5537 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
5538 else
5539 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
5540 return bm;
5541 }
5542 }
5543 catch (Exception ex)
5544 {
5545 Console.WriteLine($"Error: {ex.Message}");
5546 return null;
5547 }
5548 return null;
5549 }
5576 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, int serie, bool tab, bool addToImages, bool tile, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
5577 {
5578 if (file == null || file == "")
5579 throw new InvalidDataException("File is empty or null");
5580 //We wait incase OME has not initialized.
5581 do
5582 {
5583 Thread.Sleep(10);
5584 } while (!initialized);
5585 Console.WriteLine("OpenOME " + file);
5586
5587 Progress pr = Progress.Create(file, "Opening OME", "Opening OME file.");
5588 // update ui on main UI thread
5589 Application.Invoke(delegate
5590 {
5591 pr.Show();
5592 pr.Present();
5593 });
5594 if (tileSizeX == 0)
5595 tileSizeX = 1920;
5596 if (tileSizeY == 0)
5597 tileSizeY = 1080;
5598 progressValue = 0;
5599 progFile = file;
5600 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
5601 b.Loading = true;
5602 if (b.meta == null)
5603 b.meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
5604 string f = file.Replace("\\", "/");
5605 string cf = reader.getCurrentFile();
5606 if (cf != null)
5607 cf = cf.Replace("\\", "/");
5608 if (cf != f)
5609 {
5610 reader.close();
5611 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
5612 reader.setId(f);
5613 pr.Status = "Reading Metadata";
5614 }
5615 //status = "Reading OME Metadata.";
5616 reader.setSeries(serie);
5617 int RGBChannelCount = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
5618 if (reader.getOptimalTileWidth() != reader.getSizeX())
5619 {
5620 b.ispyramidal = true;
5621 tile = true;
5622 }
5623 //OME reader.getBitsPerPixel(); sometimes returns incorrect bits per pixel, like when opening ImageJ images.
5624 //So we check the pixel type from xml metadata and if it fails we use the readers value.
5625 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
5626 try
5627 {
5628 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, b.meta.getPixelsType(serie));
5629 }
5630 catch (Exception)
5631 {
5632 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, reader.getBitsPerPixel());
5633 }
5634
5635 b.id = file;
5636 b.file = file;
5637 int SizeX, SizeY;
5638 SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
5639 SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
5640 int SizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
5641 b.sizeC = reader.getSizeC();
5642 b.sizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
5643 b.sizeT = reader.getSizeT();
5644 b.littleEndian = reader.isLittleEndian();
5645 b.seriesCount = reader.getSeriesCount();
5646 b.imagesPerSeries = reader.getImageCount();
5647 b.bitsPerPixel = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
5648 b.series = serie;
5649 string order = reader.getDimensionOrder();
5650
5651 //Lets get the channels and initialize them
5652 int i = 0;
5653 pr.Status = "Reading Channels";
5654 int sumSamples = 0;
5655 while (true)
5656 {
5657 Channel ch = new Channel(i, b.bitsPerPixel, 1);
5658 bool def = false;
5659 try
5660 {
5661 if (b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i) != null)
5662 {
5663 int s = b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
5664 ch.SamplesPerPixel = s;
5665 sumSamples += s;
5666 def = true;
5667 }
5668 if (b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i) != null)
5669 ch.Name = b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i);
5670 if (b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i) != null)
5671 ch.AcquisitionMode = b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i).ToString();
5672 if (b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i) != null)
5673 ch.info.ID = b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i);
5674 if (b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i) != null)
5675 ch.Fluor = b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i);
5676 if (b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i) != null)
5677 {
5678 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color cc = b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i);
5679 ch.Color = Color.FromArgb(cc.getRed(), cc.getGreen(), cc.getBlue());
5680 }
5681 if (b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i) != null)
5682 ch.IlluminationType = b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i).ToString();
5683 if (b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i) != null)
5684 ch.ContrastMethod = b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i).ToString();
5685 if (b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i) != null)
5686 ch.Emission = b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
5687 if (b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i) != null)
5688 ch.Excitation = b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
5689 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i) != null)
5690 ch.LightSourceIntensity = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i).value().doubleValue();
5691 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i) != null)
5692 ch.DiodeName = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i);
5693 if (b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i) != null)
5694 ch.LightSourceAttenuation = b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i).toString();
5695
5696 }
5697 catch (Exception e)
5698 {
5699 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
5700 }
5701 //If this channel is not defined we have loaded all the channels in the file.
5702 if (!def)
5703 break;
5704 else
5705 b.Channels.Add(ch);
5706 if (i == 0)
5707 {
5708 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
5709 }
5710 else
5711 if (i == 1)
5712 {
5713 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
5714 }
5715 else
5716 if (i == 2)
5717 {
5718 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
5719 }
5720 i++;
5721 }
5722 //If the file doens't have channels we initialize them.
5723 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
5724 {
5725 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
5726 }
5727
5728 //Bioformats gives a size of 3 for C when saved in ImageJ as RGB. We need to correct for this as C should be 1 for RGB.
5729 if (RGBChannelCount >= 3)
5730 {
5731 b.sizeC = sumSamples / b.Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel;
5732 }
5733 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
5734
5735 int resc = reader.getResolutionCount();
5736 for (int s = 0; s < b.seriesCount; s++)
5737 {
5738 reader.setSeries(s);
5739 for (int r = 0; r < reader.getResolutionCount(); r++)
5740 {
5741 Resolution res = new Resolution();
5742 try
5743 {
5744 int rgbc = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
5745 int bps = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
5746 PixelFormat px;
5747 try
5748 {
5749 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, b.meta.getPixelsType(s));
5750 }
5751 catch (Exception)
5752 {
5753 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, bps);
5754 }
5755 res.PixelFormat = px;
5756 res.SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
5757 res.SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
5758 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(s) != null)
5759 {
5760 res.PhysicalSizeX = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(s).value().doubleValue();
5761 }
5762 else
5763 res.PhysicalSizeX = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
5764 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(s) != null)
5765 {
5766 res.PhysicalSizeY = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(s).value().doubleValue();
5767 }
5768 else
5769 res.PhysicalSizeY = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
5770
5771 if (b.meta.getStageLabelX(s) != null)
5772 res.StageSizeX = b.meta.getStageLabelX(s).value().doubleValue();
5773 if (b.meta.getStageLabelY(s) != null)
5774 res.StageSizeY = b.meta.getStageLabelY(s).value().doubleValue();
5775 if (b.meta.getStageLabelZ(s) != null)
5776 res.StageSizeZ = b.meta.getStageLabelZ(s).value().doubleValue();
5777 else
5778 res.StageSizeZ = 1;
5779 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(s) != null)
5780 {
5781 res.PhysicalSizeZ = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(s).value().doubleValue();
5782 }
5783 else
5784 {
5785 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
5786 }
5787 }
5788 catch (Exception e)
5789 {
5790 Console.WriteLine("No Stage Coordinates. PhysicalSize:(" + res.PhysicalSizeX + "," + res.PhysicalSizeY + "," + res.PhysicalSizeZ + ")");
5791 }
5792 b.Resolutions.Add(res);
5793 }
5794 }
5795 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
5796 pr.Status = "Reading ROIs";

6020 an.id = b.meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);

6095
6096 List<string> serFiles = new List<string>();
6097 serFiles.AddRange(reader.getSeriesUsedFiles());
6098
6099 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
6100 try
6101 {
6102 string st = OpenSlideGTK.OpenSlideImage.DetectVendor(file);
6103 if(st != null)
6104 b.openSlideImage = OpenSlideGTK.OpenSlideImage.Open(file);
6105 }
6106 catch (Exception e)
6107 {
6108 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
6109 }
6110
6111 // read the image data bytes
6112 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
6113 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
6114 int z = 0;
6115 int c = 0;
6116 int t = 0;
6117 pr.Status = "Reading Image Data";
6118 if (!tile)
6119 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
6120 {
6121 Bitmap bf;
6122 pr.ProgressValue = (float)p / (float)pages;
6123 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
6124 bf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(z, c, t), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
6125 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
6126 }
6127 else
6128 {
6129 b.Buffers.Add(GetTile(b, new ZCT(z, c, t), serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY));
6130 Statistics.CalcStatistics(b.Buffers.Last());
6131 }
6132 int pls;
6133 try
6134 {
6135 pls = b.meta.getPlaneCount(serie);
6136 }
6137 catch (Exception)
6138 {
6139 pls = 0;
6140 }
6141 pr.Status = "Reading Plane Data";
6142 if (pls == b.Buffers.Count)
6143 for (int bi = 0; bi < b.Buffers.Count; bi++)
6144 {
6145 Plane pl = new Plane();
6146 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT();
6147 double px = 0; double py = 0; double pz = 0;
6148 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi) != null)
6149 px = b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6150 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi) != null)
6151 py = b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6152 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi) != null)
6153 pz = b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6154 pl.Location = new AForge.Point3D(px, py, pz);
6155 int cc = 0; int zc = 0; int tc = 0;
6156 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
6157 cc = b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
6158 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
6159 zc = b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
6160 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
6161 tc = b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
6162 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT(zc, cc, tc);
6163 if (b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi) != null)
6164 pl.Delta = b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6165 if (b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi) != null)
6166 pl.Exposure = b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6167 b.Buffers[bi].Plane = pl;
6168 }
6169
6170 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, order);
6171 //We wait for histogram image statistics calculation
6172 do
6173 {
6174 Thread.Sleep(50);
6175 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
6176 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
6177 AutoThreshold(b, true);
6178 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6179 b.StackThreshold(true);
6180 else
6181 b.StackThreshold(false);
6182 if (addToImages)
6183 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
6184 //We use a try block to close the reader as sometimes this will cause an error.
6185 bool stop = false;
6186 do
6187 {
6188 try
6189 {
6190 reader.close();
6191 stop = true;
6192 }
6193 catch (Exception e)
6194 {
6195 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6196 }
6197 } while (!stop);
6198 b.Loading = false;
6199 b.SetLabelMacroResolutions();
6200 // update ui on main UI thread
6201 Application.Invoke(delegate
6202 {
6203 pr.Hide();
6204 });
6205 Console.WriteLine("Opening complete " + file);
6206 return b;
6207 }
6208 public ImageReader imRead;
6209 public Tiff tifRead;
6210 public OpenSlideGTK.OpenSlideImage openSlideImage;
6211 static Bitmap bm;
6224 public static Bitmap GetTile(BioImage b, ZCT coord, int serie, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
6225 {
6226 if ((b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && vips) || (b.file.EndsWith(".tif") && vips))
6227 {
6228 //We can get a tile faster with libvips rather than bioformats.
6229 return ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(b, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY, serie);
6230 }
6231 //We check if we can open this with OpenSlide as this is faster than Bioformats with IKVM.
6232 if(b.openSlideImage != null)
6233 {
6234 return new Bitmap(tileSizeX, tileSizeY, AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb, b.openSlideImage.ReadRegion(serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY),coord,"");
6235 }
6236
6237 string curfile = reader.getCurrentFile();
6238 if (curfile == null)
6239 {
6240 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6241 reader.close();
6242 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6243 Console.WriteLine(b.file);
6244 reader.setId(b.file);
6245 }
6246 else
6247 {
6248 string fi = b.file.Replace("\\", "/");
6249 string cf = curfile.Replace("\\", "/");
6250 if (cf != fi)
6251 {
6252 reader.close();
6253 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6254 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6255 reader.setId(b.file);
6256 }
6257 }
6258 if (reader.getSeries() != serie)
6259 reader.setSeries(serie);
6260 int SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
6261 int SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
6262 bool flat = reader.hasFlattenedResolutions();
6263 int p = b.Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T];
6264 bool littleEndian = reader.isLittleEndian();
6265 PixelFormat PixelFormat = b.Resolutions[serie].PixelFormat;
6266 if (tilex < 0)
6267 tilex = 0;
6268 if (tiley < 0)
6269 tiley = 0;
6270 if (tilex >= SizeX)
6271 tilex = SizeX;
6272 if (tiley >= SizeY)
6273 tiley = SizeY;
6274 int sx = tileSizeX;
6275 if (tilex + tileSizeX > SizeX)
6276 sx -= (tilex + tileSizeX) - (SizeX);
6277 int sy = tileSizeY;
6278 if (tiley + tileSizeY > SizeY)
6279 sy -= (tiley + tileSizeY) - (SizeY);
6280 //For some reason calling openBytes with 1x1px area causes an exception.
6281 if (sx <= 1)
6282 return null;
6283 if (sy <= 1)
6284 return null;
6285 try
6286 {
6287 byte[] bytesr = reader.openBytes(b.Coords[coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T], tilex, tiley, sx, sy);
6288 bool interleaved = reader.isInterleaved();
6289 if (bm != null)
6290 bm.Dispose();
6291 bm = new Bitmap(b.file, sx, sy, PixelFormat, bytesr, coord, p, null, littleEndian, interleaved);
6292 return bm;
6293 }
6294 catch (Exception e)
6295 {
6296 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6297 return null;
6298 }
6299 }
6304 public void StackThreshold(bool bit16)
6305 {
6306 if (bit16)
6307 {
6308 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
6309 {
6310 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
6311 {
6312 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
6313 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
6314 }
6315 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 16;
6316 }
6317 bitsPerPixel = 16;
6318 }
6319 else
6320 {
6321 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
6322 {
6323 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
6324 {
6325 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
6326 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
6327 }
6328 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 8;
6329 }
6330 bitsPerPixel = 8;
6331 }
6332 }
6343 public static int GetBitsPerPixel(int bt)
6344 {
6345 if (bt <= 255)
6346 return 8;
6347 if (bt <= 512)
6348 return 9;
6349 else if (bt <= 1023)
6350 return 10;
6351 else if (bt <= 2047)
6352 return 11;
6353 else if (bt <= 4095)
6354 return 12;
6355 else if (bt <= 8191)
6356 return 13;
6357 else if (bt <= 16383)
6358 return 14;
6359 else if (bt <= 32767)
6360 return 15;
6361 else
6362 return 16;
6363 }
6369 public static int GetBitMaxValue(int bt)
6370 {
6371 if (bt == 8)
6372 return 255;
6373 if (bt == 9)
6374 return 512;
6375 else if (bt == 10)
6376 return 1023;
6377 else if (bt == 11)
6378 return 2047;
6379 else if (bt == 12)
6380 return 4095;
6381 else if (bt == 13)
6382 return 8191;
6383 else if (bt == 14)
6384 return 16383;
6385 else if (bt == 15)
6386 return 32767;
6387 else
6388 return 65535;
6389 }
6399 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, int bitsPerPixel)
6400 {
6401 if (bitsPerPixel == 8)
6402 {
6403 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
6404 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
6405 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
6406 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
6407 else if (rgbChannelCount == 4)
6408 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
6409 }
6410 else
6411 {
6412 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
6413 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
6414 if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
6415 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
6416 }
6417 throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported pixel format.");
6418 }
6429 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType px)
6430 {
6431 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
6432 {
6433 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
6434 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
6435 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
6436 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
6437 }
6438 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
6439 {
6440 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
6441 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
6442 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
6443 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
6444 }
6445 else
6446 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
6447 throw new InvalidDataException("RGBChannels Count of " + rgbChannelCount + " not supported.");
6448 }
6456 public static BioImage[] OpenOMESeries(string file, bool tab, bool addToImages)
6457 {
6458 //We wait incase OME has not initialized yet.
6459 if (!initialized)
6460 do
6461 {
6462 Thread.Sleep(100);
6463 //Application.DoEvents();
6464 } while (!Initialized);
6465 var meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6466 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
6467 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
6468 try
6469 {
6470 if (reader.getCurrentFile() != file)
6471 {
6472 status = "Opening OME Image.";
6473 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
6474 reader.setId(file);
6475 }
6476 }
6477 catch (Exception e)
6478 {
6479 Scripting.LogLine(e.Message);
6480 return null;
6481 }
6482
6483 bool tile = false;
6484 if (reader.getOptimalTileWidth() != reader.getSizeX())
6485 tile = true;
6486 int count = reader.getSeriesCount();
6487 BioImage[] bs = null;
6488 if (tile)
6489 {
6490 bs = new BioImage[1];
6491 bs[0] = OpenOME(file, 0, tab, addToImages, true, 0, 0, 1920, 1080);
6492 bs[0].isPyramidal = true;
6493 Images.AddImage(bs[0], tab);
6494 return bs;
6495 }
6496 else
6497 bs = new BioImage[count];
6498 reader.close();
6499 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
6500 {
6501 bs[i] = OpenOME(file, i, tab, addToImages, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
6502 if (bs[i] == null)
6503 return null;
6504 }
6505 return bs;
6506 }

6550 public static BioImage ImagesToStack(string[] files, bool tab)
6551 {
6552 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[files.Length];
6553 int z = 0;
6554 int c = 0;
6555 int t = 0;
6556 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
6557 {
6558 string str = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(files[i]);
6559 str = str.Replace(".ome", "");
6560 string[] st = str.Split('_');
6561 if (st.Length > 3)
6562 {
6563 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
6564 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
6565 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
6566 }
6567 if (i == 0)
6568 bs[0] = OpenOME(files[i], tab);
6569 else
6570 {
6571 bs[i] = OpenFile(files[i], 0, tab, false);
6572 }
6573 }
6574 BioImage b = BioImage.CopyInfo(bs[0], true, true);
6575 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
6576 {
6577 for (int bc = 0; bc < bs[i].Buffers.Count; bc++)
6578 {
6579 b.Buffers.Add(bs[i].Buffers[bc]);
6580 }
6581 }
6582 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
6583 b.Volume = new VolumeD(bs[0].Volume.Location, new Point3D(bs[0].SizeX * bs[0].PhysicalSizeX, bs[0].SizeY * bs[0].PhysicalSizeY, (z + 1) * bs[0].PhysicalSizeZ));
6584 return b;
6585 }
6589 public static void Update(BioImage b)
6590 {
6591 b = OpenFile(b.file);
6592 }
6594 public void Update()
6595 {
6596 Update(this);
6597 }

6771 public static List<ROI> OpenOMEROIs(string file, int series)
6772 {
6773 List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
6774 // create OME-XML metadata store
6775 ServiceFactory factory = new ServiceFactory();
6776 OMEXMLService service = (OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService));
6777 loci.formats.ome.OMEXMLMetadata meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
6778 // create format reader
6779 ImageReader imageReader = new ImageReader();
6780 imageReader.setMetadataStore(meta);
6781 // initialize file
6782 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
6783 imageReader.setId(file);
6784 int imageCount = imageReader.getImageCount();
6785 int seriesCount = imageReader.getSeriesCount();
6786 double physicalSizeX = 0;
6787 double physicalSizeY = 0;
6788 double physicalSizeZ = 0;
6789 double stageSizeX = 0;
6790 double stageSizeY = 0;
6791 double stageSizeZ = 0;
6792 int SizeX = imageReader.getSizeX();
6793 int SizeY = imageReader.getSizeY();
6794 int SizeZ = imageReader.getSizeY();
6795 try
6796 {
6797 bool hasPhysical = false;
6798 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series) != null)
6799 {
6800 physicalSizeX = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series).value().doubleValue();
6801 hasPhysical = true;
6802 }
6803 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series) != null)
6804 {
6805 physicalSizeY = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series).value().doubleValue();
6806 }
6807 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series) != null)
6808 {
6809 physicalSizeZ = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series).value().doubleValue();
6810 }
6811 else
6812 {
6813 physicalSizeZ = 1;
6814 }
6815 if (meta.getStageLabelX(series) != null)
6816 stageSizeX = meta.getStageLabelX(series).value().doubleValue();
6817 if (meta.getStageLabelY(series) != null)
6818 stageSizeY = meta.getStageLabelY(series).value().doubleValue();
6819 if (meta.getStageLabelZ(series) != null)
6820 stageSizeZ = meta.getStageLabelZ(series).value().doubleValue();
6821 else
6822 stageSizeZ = 1;
6823 }
6824 catch (Exception e)
6825 {
6826 stageSizeX = 0;
6827 stageSizeY = 0;
6828 stageSizeZ = 1;
6829 }
6830 VolumeD volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(stageSizeX, stageSizeY, stageSizeZ), new Point3D(physicalSizeX * SizeX, physicalSizeY * SizeY, physicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
6831 int rc = meta.getROICount();
6832 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
6833 {
6834 string roiID = meta.getROIID(im);
6835 string roiName = meta.getROIName(im);
6836 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
6837 int scount = 1;
6838 try
6839 {
6840 scount = meta.getShapeCount(im);
6841 }
6842 catch (Exception e)
6843 {
6844 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
6845 }
6846 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
6847 {
6848 string type = meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
6849 ROI an = new ROI();
6850 an.roiID = roiID;
6851 an.roiName = roiName;
6852 an.shapeIndex = sc;
6853 if (type == "Point")
6854 {
6855 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
6856 an.id = meta.getPointID(im, sc);
6857 double dx = meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6858 double dy = meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6859 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
6860 an.coord = new ZCT();
6861 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
6862 if (nz != null)
6863 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6864 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
6865 if (nc != null)
6866 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6867 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
6868 if (nt != null)
6869 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6870 an.Text = meta.getPointText(im, sc);
6871 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
6872 if (fl != null)
6873 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6874 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
6875 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
6876 if (col != null)
6877 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6878 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6879 if (fw != null)
6880 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6881 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
6882 if (colf != null)
6883 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6884 }
6885 else
6886 if (type == "Line")
6887 {
6888 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
6889 an.id = meta.getLineID(im, sc);
6890 double px1 = meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
6891 double py1 = meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
6892 double px2 = meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
6893 double py2 = meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
6894 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
6895 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
6896 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
6897 if (nz != null)
6898 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6899 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
6900 if (nc != null)
6901 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6902 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
6903 if (nt != null)
6904 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6905 an.coord = co;
6906 an.Text = meta.getLineText(im, sc);
6907 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
6908 if (fl != null)
6909 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6910 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
6911 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
6912 if (col != null)
6913 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6914 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6915 if (fw != null)
6916 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6917 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
6918 if (colf != null)
6919 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6920 }
6921 else
6922 if (type == "Rectangle")
6923 {
6924 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
6925 an.id = meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
6926 double px = meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6927 double py = meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6928 double pw = meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
6929 double ph = meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
6930 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
6931 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
6932 if (nz != null)
6933 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6934 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
6935 if (nc != null)
6936 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6937 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
6938 if (nt != null)
6939 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6940 an.coord = co;
6941
6942 an.Text = meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
6943 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
6944 if (fl != null)
6945 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6946 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
6947 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
6948 if (col != null)
6949 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6950 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6951 if (fw != null)
6952 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6953 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
6954 if (colf != null)
6955 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6956 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
6957 }
6958 else
6959 if (type == "Ellipse")
6960 {
6961 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
6962 an.id = meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
6963 double px = meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6964 double py = meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6965 double ew = meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6966 double eh = meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6967 //We convert the ellipse radius to Rectangle
6968 double w = ew * 2;
6969 double h = eh * 2;
6970 double x = px - ew;
6971 double y = py - eh;
6972 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, w, h), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
6973 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
6974 if (nz != null)
6975 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6976 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
6977 if (nc != null)
6978 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6979 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
6980 if (nt != null)
6981 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6982 an.coord = co;

7119 public static string ROIsToString(List<ROI> Annotations)

7134 public static string ROIToString(ROI an)
7135 {
7136 PointD[] points = an.GetPoints();
7137 string pts = "";
7138 for (int j = 0; j < points.Length; j++)
7139 {
7140 if (j == points.Length - 1)
7141 pts += points[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + points[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7142 else
7143 pts += points[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + points[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + " ";
7144 }
7145 char sep = (char)34;
7146 string sColor = sep.ToString() + an.strokeColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
7147 string bColor = sep.ToString() + an.fillColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
7148
7149 string line = an.roiID + ',' + an.roiName + ',' + an.type.ToString() + ',' + an.id + ',' + an.shapeIndex.ToString() + ',' +
7150 an.Text + ',' + an.serie + ',' + an.coord.Z.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.C.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.T.ToString() + ',' + an.X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + an.Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' +
7151 an.W.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + an.H.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + sep.ToString() + pts + sep.ToString() + ',' + sColor + ',' + an.strokeWidth.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + bColor + ',' + an.fontSize.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + NewLine;
7152 return line;
7153 }
7159 public static ROI StringToROI(string sts)
7160 {
7161 //Works with either comma or tab separated values.
7162 if (sts.StartsWith("<?xml") || sts.StartsWith("{"))
7163 return null;
7164 ROI an = new ROI();
7165 string val = "";
7166 bool inSep = false;
7167 int col = 0;
7168 double x = 0;
7169 double y = 0;
7170 double w = 0;
7171 double h = 0;
7172 string line = sts;
7173 bool points = false;
7174 char sep = '"';
7175 for (int i = 0; i < line.Length; i++)
7176 {
7177 char c = line[i];
7178 if (c == sep)
7179 {
7180 if (!inSep)
7181 {
7182 inSep = true;
7183 }
7184 else
7185 inSep = false;
7186 continue;
7187 }
7188
7189 if ((c == ',' || c == '\t') && (!inSep || points))
7190 {
7191 //ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE
7192 if (col == 0)
7193 {
7194 //ROIID
7195 an.roiID = val;
7196 }
7197 else
7198 if (col == 1)
7199 {
7200 //ROINAME
7201 an.roiName = val;
7202 }
7203 else
7204 if (col == 2)
7205 {
7206 //TYPE
7207 an.type = (ROI.Type)Enum.Parse(typeof(ROI.Type), val);
7208 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform || an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon)
7209 an.closed = true;
7210 }
7211 else
7212 if (col == 3)
7213 {
7214 //ID
7215 an.id = val;
7216 }
7217 else
7218 if (col == 4)
7219 {
7220 //SHAPEINDEX/
7221 an.shapeIndex = int.Parse(val);
7222 }
7223 else
7224 if (col == 5)
7225 {
7226 //TEXT/
7227 an.Text = val;
7228 }
7229 else
7230 if (col == 6)
7231 {
7232 an.serie = int.Parse(val);
7233 }
7234 else
7235 if (col == 7)
7236 {
7237 an.coord.Z = int.Parse(val);
7238 }
7239 else
7240 if (col == 8)
7241 {
7242 an.coord.C = int.Parse(val);
7243 }
7244 else
7245 if (col == 9)
7246 {
7247 an.coord.T = int.Parse(val);
7248 }
7249 else
7250 if (col == 10)
7251 {
7252 x = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7253 }
7254 else
7255 if (col == 11)
7256 {
7257 y = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7258 }
7259 else
7260 if (col == 12)
7261 {
7262 w = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7263 }
7264 else
7265 if (col == 13)
7266 {
7267 h = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7268 }
7269 else
7270 if (col == 14)
7271 {
7272 //POINTS
7273 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(val));
7274 points = false;
7275 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
7276 }
7277 else
7278 if (col == 15)
7279 {
7280 //STROKECOLOR
7281 string[] st = val.Split(',');
7282 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
7283 }
7284 else
7285 if (col == 16)
7286 {
7287 //STROKECOLORW
7288 an.strokeWidth = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7289 }
7290 else
7291 if (col == 17)
7292 {
7293 //FILLCOLOR
7294 string[] st = val.Split(',');
7295 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
7296 }
7297 else
7298 if (col == 18)
7299 {
7300 //FONTSIZE
7301 double s = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7302 an.fontSize = (float)s;
7303 an.family = "Times New Roman";
7304 }
7305 col++;
7306 val = "";
7307 }
7308 else
7309 val += c;
7310 }
7311
7312 return an;
7313 }

7329 public static List<ROI> ImportROIsCSV(string filename)
7330 {
7331 List<ROI> list = new List<ROI>();
7332 if (!File.Exists(filename))
7333 return list;
7334 string[] sts = File.ReadAllLines(filename);
7335 //We start reading from line 1.
7336 for (int i = 1; i < sts.Length; i++)
7337 {
7338 list.Add(StringToROI(sts[i]));
7339 }
7340 return list;
7341 }
7349 public static void ExportROIFolder(string path, string filename)

7352 int i = 0;
7353 foreach (string f in fs)
7354 {
7355 List<ROI> annotations = OpenOMEROIs(f, 0);
7356 string ff = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(f);
7357 ExportROIsCSV(path + "//" + ff + "-" + i.ToString() + ".csv", annotations);
7358 i++;
7359 }

7362 private static BioImage bstats = null;
7363 private static bool update = false;
7389 public static void AutoThreshold(BioImage b, bool updateImageStats)
7390 {
7391 bstats = b;
7392 Statistics statistics = null;
7393 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7394 statistics = new Statistics(true);
7395 else
7396 statistics = new Statistics(false);
7397 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers.Count; i++)
7398 {
7399 if (b.Buffers[i].Stats == null || updateImageStats)
7400 b.Buffers[i].Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(b.Buffers[i]);
7401 if (b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
7402 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[0]);
7403 else
7404 {
7405 for (int r = 0; r < b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount; r++)
7406 {
7407 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[r]);
7408 }
7409 }
7410 }
7411 for (int c = 0; c < b.Channels.Count; c++)
7412 {
7413 Statistics[] sts = new Statistics[b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount];
7414 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount; i++)
7415 {
7416 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7417 {
7418 sts[i] = new Statistics(true);
7419 }
7420 else
7421 sts[i] = new Statistics(false);
7422 }
7423 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
7424 {
7425 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
7426 {
7427 int ind;
7428 if(b.Channels.Count > b.SizeC)
7429 {
7430 ind = b.Coords[z, 0, t];
7431 }
7432 else
7433 ind = b.Coords[z, c, t];
7434 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
7435 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
7436 else
7437 {
7438 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
7439 sts[1].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[1]);
7440 sts[2].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[2]);
7441 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
7442 sts[3].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[3]);
7443 }
7444 }
7445 }
7446 if (b.RGBChannelCount == 1)
7447 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
7448 else
7449 {
7450 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
7451 sts[1].MeanHistogram();
7452 sts[2].MeanHistogram();
7453 if (b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
7454 sts[3].MeanHistogram();
7455 }
7456 b.Channels[c].stats = sts;
7457 }
7458 statistics.MeanHistogram();
7459 b.statistics = statistics;
7460
7461 }
7463 public static void AutoThreshold()
7464 {
7465 AutoThreshold(bstats, update);
7466 }
7470 public static void AutoThresholdThread(BioImage b)
7471 {
7472 bstats = b;
7473 Thread th = new Thread(AutoThreshold);
7474 th.Start();
7475 }
7487 public static int FindFocus(BioImage im, int Channel, int Time)
7488 {
7489 long mf = 0;
7490 int fr = 0;
7491 List<double> dt = new List<double>();
7492 ZCT c = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
7493 for (int i = 0; i < im.SizeZ; i++)
7494 {
7495 long f = CalculateFocusQuality(im.Buffers[im.Coords[i, Channel, Time]]);
7496 dt.Add(f);
7497 if (f > mf)
7498 {
7499 mf = f;
7500 fr = im.Coords[i, Channel, Time];
7501 }
7502 }
7503 Plot pl = Plot.Create(dt.ToArray(), "Focus");
7504 pl.Show();
7505 return fr;
7506 }
7514 static long CalculateFocusQuality(Bitmap b)
7515 {
7516 if (b.RGBChannelsCount == 1)
7517 {
7518 long sum = 0;
7519 long sumOfSquaresR = 0;
7520 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
7521 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
7522 {
7523 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
7524 sum += pixel.R;
7525 sumOfSquaresR += pixel.R * pixel.R;
7526 }
7527 return sumOfSquaresR * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
7528 }
7529 else
7530 {
7531 long sum = 0;
7532 long sumOfSquares = 0;
7533 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
7534 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
7535 {
7536 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
7537 int p = (pixel.R + pixel.G + pixel.B) / 3;
7538 sum += p;
7539 sumOfSquares += p * p;
7540 }
7541 return sumOfSquares * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
7542 }
7543 }
